GE09ram_01_u:889: 1.024.006a dadau nāgasahasrasya balaṃ cāsyāḥ pitāmahaḥ 1.024.006c na tv eva putraṃ yakṣāya dadau brahmā mahāyaśāḥ 1.024.007a tāṃ tu jātāṃ vivardhantīṃ rūpayauvanaśālinīm 1.024.007c jambhaputrāya sundāya dadau bhāryāṃ yaśasvinīm 1.024.008a kasya cit tv atha kālalsya yakṣī putraṃ vyajāyata 1.024.008c mārīcaṃ nāma durdharṣaṃ yaḥ śāpād rākṣaso 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:890: 1.024.009a sunde tu nihate rāma agastyam ṛṣisattamam
GE09ram_01_u:891: 1.024.009c tāṭakā saha putreṇa pradharṣayitum icchati 1.024.010a rākṣasatvaṃ bhajasveti mārīcaṃ vyājahāra saḥ 1.024.010c agastyaḥ paramakruddhas tāṭakām api śaptavān 1.024.011a puruṣādī mahāyakṣī virūpā vikṛtānanā
GE09ram_01_u:892: 1.024.011c idaṃ rūpam apahāya dāruṇaṃ rūpam astu te
GE09ram_01_u:894: 1.024.012c deśam utsādayaty enam agastyacaritaṃ śubham 1.024.013a enāṃ rāghava durvṛttāṃ yakṣīṃ paramadāruṇām 1.024.013c gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya jahi duṣṭaparākramām
GE09ram_01_u:895: 1.024.014a na hy enāṃ śāpasaṃsṛṣṭāṃ kaś cid utsahate pumān 1.024.014c nihantuṃ triṣu lokeṣu tvām ṛte raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:896: 1.024.015a na hi te strīvadhakṛte ghṛṇā kāryā narottama
GE09ram_01_u:899: 1.024.016c adharmyāṃ jahi kākutsha dharmo hy asyā na vidyate 1.024.017a śrūyate hi purā śakro virocanasutāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:900: 1.024.017c pṛthivīṃ hantum icchantīṃ mantharām abhyasūdayat 1.024.018a viṣṇunā ca purā rāma bhṛgupatnī dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_01_u:901: 1.024.018c anindraṃ lokam icchantī kāvyamātā niṣūditā 1.024.019a etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhī rājaputramahātmabhiḥ 1.024.019c adharmaniratā nāryo hatāḥ puruṣasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:902: 1.025.001a muner vacanam aklībaṃ śrutvā naravarātmajaḥ 1.025.001c rāghavaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā pratyuvāca dṛḍhavrataḥ 1.025.002a pitur vacananirdeśāt pitur vacanagauravāt
GE09ram_01_u:905: 1.025.003c pitrā daśarathenāhaṃ nāvajñeyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:906: 1.025.004a so 'haṃ pitur vacaḥ śrutvā śāsanād brahma vādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:907: 1.025.004c kariṣyāmi na saṃdehas tāṭakāvadham uttamam 1.025.005a gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya deśasyāsya sukhāya ca
GE09ram_01_u:908: 1.025.005c tava caivāprameyasya vacanaṃ kartum udyataḥ 1.025.006a evam uktvā dhanurmadhye baddhvā muṣṭim ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:909: 1.025.006c jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_01_u:910: 1.025.007a tena śabdena vitrastās tāṭakā vanavāsinaḥ 1.025.007c tāṭakā ca susaṃkruddhā tena śabdena mohitā
GE09ram_01_u:911: 1.025.008a taṃ śabdam abhinidhyāya rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā 1.025.008c śrutvā cābhyadravad vegād yataḥ śabdo viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:912: 1.025.009a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ kruddhāṃ vikṛtāṃ vikṛtānanām
GE09ram_01_u:914: 1.025.010a paśya lakṣmaṇa yakṣiṇyā bhairavaṃ dāruṇaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:915: 1.025.010c bhidyeran darśanād asyā bhīrūṇāṃ hṛdayāni ca
GE09ram_01_u:916: 1.025.011a enāṃ paśya durādharṣāṃ māyā balasamanvitām 1.025.011c vinivṛttāṃ karomy adya
GE09ram_01_u:917: 1.025.012a na hy enām utsahe hantuṃ strīsvabhāvena rakṣitām
GE09ram_01_u:918: 1.025.012c vīryaṃ cāsyā gatiṃ cāpi haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:919: 1.025.013a evaṃ bruvāṇe rāme tu tāṭakā krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_01_u:920: 1.025.013c udyamya bāhū garjantī rāmam evābhyadhāvata 1.025.014a tām āpatantīṃ vegena vikrāntām aśanīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:921: 1.025.014c śareṇorasi vivyādha sā papāta mamāra ca
GE09ram_01_u:922: 1.025.015a tāṃ hatāṃ bhīmasaṃkāśāṃ dṛṣṭvā surapatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:923: 1.025.015c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ surāś ca samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:925: 1.025.016c surāś ca sarve saṃhṛṣṭā viśvāmitram athābruvan
GE09ram_01_u:926: 1.025.017a mune kauśike bhadraṃ te sendrāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:927: 1.025.017c toṣitāḥ karmaṇānena snehaṃ darśaya rāghave 1.025.018a prajāpater bhṛśāśvasya putrān satyaparākramān
GE09ram_01_u:929: 1.025.019a pātrabhūtaś ca te brahmaṃs tavānugamane dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:930: 1.025.019c kartavyaṃ ca mahat karma surāṇāṃ rājasūnunā
GE09ram_01_u:931: 1.025.020a evam uktvā surāḥ sarve hṛṣṭā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:932: 1.025.020c viśvāmitraṃ pūjayitvā tataḥ saṃdhyā pravartate 1.025.021a tato munivaraḥ prītis tāṭakā vadhatoṣitaḥ 1.025.021c mūrdhni rāmam upāghrāya idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:933: 1.025.022a ihādya rajanīṃ rāma vasema śubhadarśana 1.025.022c śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmas tad āśramapadaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:934: 1.026.001a atha tāṃ rajanīm uṣya viśvāmiro mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:935: 1.026.001c prahasya rāghavaṃ vākyam uvāca madhurākṣaram 1.026.002a patituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:936: 1.026.002c prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:938: 1.026.003c yair amitrān prasahyājau vaśīkṛtya jayiṣyasi 1.026.004a tāni divyāni bhadraṃ te dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:939: 1.026.004c daṇḍacakraṃ mahad divyaṃ tava dāsyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:940: 1.026.005a dharmacakraṃ tato vīra kālacakraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:941: 1.026.005c viṣṇucakraṃ tathātyugram aindraṃ cakraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:942: 1.026.006a vajram astraṃ naraśreṣṭha śaivaṃ śūlavaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:943: 1.026.006c astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva aiṣīkam api rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:944: 1.026.007a dadāmi te mahābāho brāhmam astram anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:945: 1.026.007c gade dve caiva kākutstha modakī śikharī ubhe
GE09ram_01_u:947: 1.026.008c dharmapāśam ahaṃ rāma kālapāśaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:948: 1.026.009a vāruṇaṃ pāśam astraṃ ca dadāny aham anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:949: 1.026.009c aśanī dve prayacchāmi śuṣkārdre raghunandana 1.026.010a dadāmi cāstraṃ painākam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:950: 1.026.010c āgneyam astra dayitaṃ śikharaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:951: 1.026.011a vāyavyaṃ prathamaṃ nāma dadāmi tava rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:952: 1.026.011c astraṃ hayaśiro nāma krauñcam astraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:953: 1.026.012a śakti dvayaṃ ca kākutstha dadāmi tava cānagha
GE09ram_01_u:954: 1.026.012c kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ ghoraṃ kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:955: 1.026.013a dhārayanty asurā yāni dadāmy etāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:956: 1.026.013c vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca nandanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:958: 1.026.014c gāndharvam astraṃ dayitaṃ mānavaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:959: 1.026.015a prasvāpanapraśamane dadmi sauraṃ ca rāghava 1.026.015c darpaṇaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ caiva
GE09ram_01_u:960: 1.026.016a madanaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ kandarpadayitaṃ tathā 1.026.016c paiśācam astraṃ dayitaṃ mohanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:962: 1.026.017a tāmasaṃ naraśārdūla saumanaṃ ca mahābalam 1.026.017c saṃvartaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mausalaṃ ca nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:963: 1.026.018a satyam astraṃ mahābāho tathā māyādharaṃ param
GE09ram_01_u:965: 1.026.019a somāstraṃ śiśiraṃ nāma tvāṣṭram astraṃ sudāmanam
GE09ram_01_u:966: 1.026.019c dāruṇaṃ ca bhagasyāpi śīteṣum atha mānavam
GE09ram_01_u:967: 1.026.020a etān nāma mahābāho kāmarūpān mahābalān 1.026.020c gṛhāṇa paramodārān kṣipram eva nṛpātmaja 1.026.021a sthitas tu prāṅmukho bhūtvā śucir nivaratas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:968: 1.026.021c dadau rāmāya suprīto mantragrāmam anuttamam 1.026.022a japatas tu munes tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:969: 1.026.022c upatasthur mahārhāṇi sarvāṇy astrāṇi rāghavam 1.026.023a ūcuś ca muditā rāmaṃ sarve prāñjalayas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:970: 1.026.023c ime sma paramodāra kiṃkarās tava rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:971: 1.026.024a pratigṛhya ca kākutsthaḥ samālabhya ca pāṇinā
GE09ram_01_u:972: 1.026.024c manasā me bhaviṣyadhvam iti tāny abhyacodayat
GE09ram_01_u:973: 1.026.025a tataḥ prītamanā rāmo viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim 1.026.025c abhivādya mahātejā gamanāyopacakrame
GE09ram_01_u:974: 1.027.001a pratigṛhya tato 'strāṇi prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śuciḥ 1.027.001c gacchann eva ca kākutstho viśvāmitram athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:976: 1.027.002c astrāṇāṃ tv aham icchāmi saṃhāraṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:977: 1.027.003a evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.027.003c saṃhāraṃ vyājahārātha dhṛtimān suvrataḥ śuciḥ 1.027.004a satyavantaṃ satyakīrtiṃ dhṛṣṭaṃ rabhasam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:981: 1.027.006a padmanābhamahānābhau dundunābhasunābhakau 1.027.006c jyotiṣaṃ kṛśanaṃ caiva nairāśya vimalāv ubhau
GE09ram_01_u:983: 1.027.007c pitryaṃ saumanasaṃ caiva vidhūtamakarāv ubhau 1.027.008a karavīrakaraṃ caiva dhanadhānyau ca rāghava 1.027.008c kāmarūpaṃ kāmaruciṃ moham āvaraṇaṃ tathā 1.027.009a jṛmbhakaṃ sarvanābhaṃ ca santānavaraṇau tathā 1.027.009c bhṛśāśvatanayān rāma bhāsvarān kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:984: 1.027.010a pratīccha mama bhadraṃ te pātrabhūto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:987: 1.027.011c ime sma naraśārdūla śādhi kiṃ karavāma te
GE09ram_01_u:988: 1.027.012a gamyatām iti tān āha yatheṣṭaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:989: 1.027.012c mānasāḥ kāryakāleṣu sāhāyyaṃ me kariṣyatha 1.027.013a atha te rāmam āmantrya kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:990: 1.027.013c evam astv iti kākutstham uktvā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:991: 1.027.014a sa ca tān rāghavo jñātvā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_01_u:992: 1.027.014c gacchann evātha madhuraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:993: 1.027.015a kiṃ nv etan meghasaṃkāśaṃ parvatasyāvidūrataḥ 1.027.015c vṛkṣaṣaṇḍam ito bhāti paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE09ram_01_u:994: 1.027.016a darśanīyaṃ mṛgākīrṇaṃ manoharam atīva ca 1.027.016c nānāprakāraiḥ śakunair valgubhāṣair
GE09ram_01_u:995: 1.027.017a niḥsṛtāḥ sma muniśreṣṭha kāntārād romaharṣaṇāt 1.027.017c anayā tv avagacchāmi deśasya sukhavattayā 1.027.018a sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kasyāśramapadaṃ tv idam
GE09ram_01_u:996: 1.027.018c saṃprāptā yatra te pāpā brahmaghnā duṣṭacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:997: 1.028.001a atha tasyāprameyasya tad vanaṃ paripṛcchataḥ 1.028.001c viśvāmitro mahātejā vyākhyātum upacakrame
GE09ram_01_u:998: 1.028.002a eṣa pūrvāśramo rāma vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ 1.028.002c siddhāśrama iti khyātaḥ siddho hy atra mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:999: 1.028.003a etasminn eva kāle tu rājā vairocanir baliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1000: 1.028.003c nirjitya daivatagaṇān sendrāṃś ca samarudgaṇān 1.028.003e kārayām āsa tad rājyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1001: 1.028.004a bales tu yajamānasya devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ 1.028.004c samāgamya svayaṃ caiva viṣṇum ūcur ihāśrame
GE09ram_01_u:1002: 1.028.005a balir vairocanir viṣṇo yajate yajñam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1003: 1.028.005c asamāpte kratau tasmin svakāryam abhipadyatām 1.028.006a ye cainam abhivartante yācitāra itas tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1004: 1.028.006c yac ca yatra yathāvac ca sarvaṃ tebhyaḥ prayacchati 1.028.007a sa tvaṃ surahitārthāya māyāyogam upāśritaḥ 1.028.007c vāmanatvaṃ gato viṣṇo kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1005: 1.028.008a ayaṃ siddhāśramo nāma prasādāt te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1006: 1.028.008c siddhe karmaṇi deveśa uttiṣṭha bhagavann itaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1007: 1.028.009a atha viṣṇur mahātejā adityāṃ samajāyata 1.028.009c vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya vairocanim upāgamat 1.028.010a trīn kramān atha bhikṣitvā pratigṛhya ca mānataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1008: 1.028.010c ākramya lokāṃl lokātmā sarvabhūtahite rataḥ 1.028.011a mahendrāya punaḥ prādān niyamya balim ojasā
GE09ram_01_u:1009: 1.028.011c trailokyaṃ sa mahātejāś cakre śakravaśaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1010: 1.028.012a tenaiṣa pūrvam ākrānta āśramaḥ śramanāśanaḥ 1.028.012c mayāpi bhaktyā tasyaiṣa
GE09ram_01_u:1011: 1.028.013a etam āśramam āyānti rākṣasā vighnakāriṇaḥ 1.028.013c atra te puruṣavyāghra hantavyā duṣṭacāriṇaḥ 1.028.014a adya gacchāmahe rāma siddhāśramam anuttamam 1.028.014c tad āśramapadaṃ tāta tavāpy etad yathā mama
GE09ram_01_u:1012: 1.028.015a taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve siddhāśramanivāsinaḥ 1.028.015c utpatyotpatya sahasā viśvāmitram apūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:1013: 1.028.016a yathārhaṃ cakrire pūjāṃ viśvāmitrāya dhīmate 1.028.016c tathaiva rājaputrābhyām akurvann atithikriyām
GE09ram_01_u:1014: 1.028.017a muhūrtam atha viśrāntau rājaputrāv ariṃdamau 1.028.017c prāñjalī muniśārdūlam ūcatū raghunandanau
GE09ram_01_u:1015: 1.028.018a adyaiva dīkṣāṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:1016: 1.028.018c siddhāśramo 'yaṃ siddhaḥ syāt satyam astu vacas tava
GE09ram_01_u:1017: 1.028.019a evam ukto mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.028.019c praviveśa tadā dīkṣāṃ niyato niyatendriyaḥ 1.028.020a kumārāv api tāṃ rātrim uṣitvā susamāhitau
GE09ram_01_u:1019: 1.029.001a atha tau deśakālajñau rājaputrāv ariṃdamau 1.029.001c deśe kāle ca vākyajñāv abrūtāṃ kauśikaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1020: 1.029.002a bhagavañ śrotum icchāvo yasmin kāle niśācarau
GE09ram_01_u:1021: 1.029.002c saṃrakṣaṇīyau tau brahman nātivarteta tatkṣaṇam 1.029.003a evaṃ bruvāṇau kākutsthau tvaramāṇau yuyutsayā 1.029.003c sarve te munayaḥ prītāḥ praśaśaṃsur nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:1022: 1.029.004a adya prabhṛti ṣaḍrātraṃ rakṣataṃ rāghavau yuvām
GE09ram_01_u:1023: 1.029.004c dīkṣāṃ gato hy eṣa munir maunitvaṃ ca gamiṣyati 1.029.005a tau tu tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrau yaśasvinau
GE09ram_01_u:1025: 1.029.006a upāsāṃ cakratur vīrau yattau paramadhanvinau 1.029.006c rarakṣatur munivaraṃ viśvāmitram ariṃdamau
GE09ram_01_u:1026: 1.029.007a atha kāle gate tasmin ṣaṣṭhe 'hani samāgate
GE09ram_01_u:1027: 1.029.007c saumitram abravīd rāmo yatto bhava samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1031: 1.029.009c ākāśe ca mahāñ śabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1032: 1.029.010a āvārya gaganaṃ megho yathā prāvṛṣi nirgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1033: 1.029.010c tathā māyāṃ vikurvāṇau rākṣasāv abhyadhāvatām 1.029.011a mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca tayor anucarās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1035: 1.029.012a tāv āpatantau sahasā dṛṣṭvā rājīvalocanaḥ 1.029.012c lakṣmaṇaṃ tv abhisaṃprekṣya rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1036: 1.029.013a paśya lakṣmaṇa durvṛttān rākṣasān piśitāśanān 1.029.013c mānavāstrasamādhūtān anilena yathāghanān
GE09ram_01_u:1038: 1.029.014c cikṣepa paramakruddho mārīcor asi rāghavaḥ 1.029.015a sa tena paramāstreṇa mānavena samāhitaḥ 1.029.015c saṃpūrṇaṃ yojanaśataṃ kṣiptaḥ sāgarasaṃplave
GE09ram_01_u:1040: 1.029.016c nirastaṃ dṛśya mārīcaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1041: 1.029.017a paśya lakṣmaṇa śīteṣuṃ mānavaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 1.029.017c mohayitvā nayaty enaṃ na ca prāṇair viyujyate
GE09ram_01_u:1042: 1.029.018a imān api vadhiṣyāmi nirghṛṇān duṣṭacāriṇaḥ 1.029.018c rākṣasān pāpakarmasthān yajñaghnān rudhirāśanān
GE09ram_01_u:1043: 1.029.019a vigṛhya sumahac cāstram āgneyaṃ raghunandanaḥ 1.029.019c subāhur asi cikṣepa sa viddhaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:1044: 1.029.020a śeṣān vāyavyam ādāya nijaghāna mahāyaśāḥ 1.029.020c rāghavaḥ paramodāro munīnāṃ mudam āvahan 1.029.021a sa hatvā rākṣasān sarvān yajñaghnān raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1045: 1.029.021c ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitas tatra yathendro vijaye purā
GE09ram_01_u:1046: 1.029.022a atha yajñe samāpte tu viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1047: 1.029.022c nirītikā diśo dṛṣṭvā kākutstham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1049: 1.029.023c siddhāśramam idaṃ satyaṃ kṛtaṃ rāma mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1050: 1.030.001a atha tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra kṛtārthau rāmalakṣaṇau
GE09ram_01_u:1053: 1.030.002c viśvāmitram ṛṣīṃś cānyān sahitāv abhijagmatuḥ 1.030.003a abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam 1.030.003c ūcatur madhurodāraṃ vākyaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇau
GE09ram_01_u:1054: 1.030.004a imau svo muniśārdūla kiṃkarau samupasthitau 1.030.004c ājñāpaya yatheṣṭaṃ vai śāsanaṃ karavāva kim
GE09ram_01_u:1055: 1.030.005a evam ukte tatas tābhyāṃ sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1056: 1.030.005c viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan 1.030.006a maithilasya naraśreṣṭha janakasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1057: 1.030.006c yajñaḥ paramadharmiṣṭhas tatra yāsyāmahe vayam 1.030.007a tvaṃ caiva naraśārdūla sahāsmābhir gamiṣyasi 1.030.007c adbhutaṃ ca dhanūratnaṃ tatra tvaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1058: 1.030.008a tad dhi pūrvaṃ naraśreṣṭha dattaṃ sadasi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1060: 1.030.009a nāsya devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ 1.030.009c kartum āropaṇaṃ śaktā na kathaṃ cana mānuṣāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1061: 1.030.010a dhanuṣas tasya vīryaṃ hi jijñāsanto mahīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1062: 1.030.010c na śekur āropayituṃ rājaputrā mahābalāḥ 1.030.011a tad dhanur naraśārdūla maithilasya mahātmanaḥ 1.030.011c tatra drakṣyasi kākutstha yajñaṃ cādbhutadarśanam 1.030.012a tad dhi yajñaphalaṃ tena maithilenottamaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1064: 1.030.013a evam uktvā munivaraḥ prasthānam akarot tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1066: 1.030.014a svasti vo 'stu gamiṣyāmi siddhaḥ siddhāśramād aham
GE09ram_01_u:1068: 1.030.015a pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā siddhāśramam anuttamam 1.030.015c uttarāṃ diśam uddiśya prasthātum upacakrame 1.030.016a taṃ vrajantaṃ munivaram anvagād anusāriṇām 1.030.016c śakaṭī śatamātraṃ tu prayāṇe brahmavādinām 1.030.017a mṛgapakṣigaṇāś caiva siddhāśramanivāsinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1070: 1.030.018a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_01_u:1071: 1.030.018c vāsaṃ cakrur munigaṇāḥ śoṇākūle samāhitāḥ 1.030.019a te 'staṃ gate dinakare snātvā hutahutāśanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1073: 1.030.020a rāmo 'pi sahasaumitrir munīṃs tān abhipūjya ca 1.030.020c agrato niṣasādātha viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1074: 1.030.021a atha rāmo mahātejā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim 1.030.021c papraccha muniśārdūlaṃ kautūhalasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1075: 1.030.022a bhagavan ko nv ayaṃ deśaḥ samṛddhavanaśobhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1076: 1.030.022c śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1077: 1.030.023a codito rāmavākyena kathayām āsa suvrataḥ 1.030.023c tasya deśasya nikhilam ṛṣimadhye mahātapāḥ 1.031.001a brahmayonir mahān āsīt kuśo nāma mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1078: 1.031.001c vaidarbhyāṃ janayām āsa caturaḥ sadṛśān sutān
GE09ram_01_u:1079: 1.031.002a kuśāmbaṃ kuśanābhaṃ ca ādhūrta rajasaṃ vasum
GE09ram_01_u:1081: 1.031.002e tān uvāca kuśaḥ putrān dharmiṣṭhān satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1082: 1.031.003a kuśasya vacanaṃ śrutvā catvāro lokasaṃmatāḥ 1.031.003c niveśaṃ cakrire sarve purāṇāṃ nṛvarās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1083: 1.031.004a kuśāmbas tu mahātejāḥ kauśāmbīm akarot purīm
GE09ram_01_u:1084: 1.031.004c kuśanābhas tu dharmātmā paraṃ cakre mahodayam
GE09ram_01_u:1086: 1.031.005c cakre puravaraṃ rājā vasuś cakre girivrajam
GE09ram_01_u:1087: 1.031.006a eṣā vasumatī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1088: 1.031.006c ete śailavarāḥ pañca prakāśante samantataḥ 1.031.007a sumāgadhī nadī ramyā māgadhān viśrutāyayau 1.031.007c pañcānāṃ śailamukhyānāṃ madhye māleva śobhate 1.031.008a saiṣā hi māgadhī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1090: 1.031.009a kuśanābhas tu rājarṣiḥ kanyāśatam anuttamam 1.031.009c janayām āsa dharmātmā ghṛtācyāṃ raghunandana 1.031.010a tās tu yauvanaśālinyo rūpavatyaḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ 1.031.010c udyānabhūmim āgamya prāvṛṣīva śatahradāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1091: 1.031.011a gāyantyo nṛtyamānāś ca vādayantyaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1093: 1.031.012a atha tāś cārusarvāṅgyo rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi 1.031.012c udyānabhūmim āgamya tārā iva ghanāntare 1.031.013a tāḥ sarvaguṇasaṃpannā rūpayauvanasaṃyutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1094: 1.031.013c dṛṣṭvā sarvātmako vāyur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1095: 1.031.014a ahaṃ vaḥ kāmaye sarvā bhāryā mama bhaviṣyatha
GE09ram_01_u:1096: 1.031.014c mānuṣas tyajyatāṃ bhāvo dīrgham āyur avāpsyatha
GE09ram_01_u:1097: 1.031.015a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyor akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1098: 1.031.015c apahāsya tato vākyaṃ kanyāśatam athābravīt 1.031.016a antaś carasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ surottama
GE09ram_01_u:1099: 1.031.016c prabhāvajñāś ca te sarvāḥ kim asmān avamanyase
GE09ram_01_u:1100: 1.031.017a kuśanābhasutāḥ sarvāḥ samarthās tvāṃ surottama 1.031.017c sthānāc cyāvayituṃ devaṃ rakṣāmas tu tapo vayam
GE09ram_01_u:1101: 1.031.018a mā bhūt sa kālo durmedhaḥ pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_01_u:1103: 1.031.019a pitā hi prabhur asmākaṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ hi saḥ 1.031.019c yasya no dāsyati pitā sa no bhartā bhaviṣyati 1.031.020a tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyuḥ paramakopanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1104: 1.031.020c praviśya sarvagātrāṇi babhañja bhagavān prabhuḥ 1.031.021a tāḥ kanyā vāyunā bhagnā viviśur nṛpater gṛham
GE09ram_01_u:1105: 1.031.021c dṛṣṭvā bhagnās tadā rājā saṃbhrānta idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1106: 1.031.022a kim idaṃ kathyatāṃ putryaḥ ko dharmam avamanyate
GE09ram_01_u:1107: 1.031.022c kubjāḥ kena kṛtāḥ sarvā veṣṭantyo nābhibhāṣatha
GE09ram_01_u:1108: 1.032.001a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1109: 1.032.001c śirobhiś caraṇau spṛṣṭvā kanyāśatam abhāṣata 1.032.002a vāyuḥ sarvātmako rājan pradharṣayitum icchati 1.032.002c aśubhaṃ mārgam āsthāya na dharmaṃ pratyavekṣate
GE09ram_01_u:1110: 1.032.003a pitṛmatyaḥ sma bhadraṃ te svacchande na vayaṃ sthitāḥ 1.032.003c pitaraṃ no vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ yadi no dāsyate tava 1.032.004a tena pāpānubandhena vacanaṃ na pratīcchatā 1.032.004c evaṃ bruvantyaḥ sarvāḥ sma vāyunā nihatā bhṛṣam
GE09ram_01_u:1111: 1.032.005a tāsāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā paramadhārmikaḥ 1.032.005c pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ kanyāśatam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1112: 1.032.006a kṣāntaṃ kṣamāvatāṃ putryaḥ kartavyaṃ sumahat kṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:1113: 1.032.006c aikamatyam upāgamya kulaṃ cāvekṣitaṃ mama 1.032.007a alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā
GE09ram_01_u:1114: 1.032.007c duṣkaraṃ tac ca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1115: 1.032.008a yādṛśīr vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1116: 1.032.008c kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ 1.032.009a kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
GE09ram_01_u:1117: 1.032.009c visṛjya kanyāḥ kākutstha rājā tridaśavikramaḥ 1.032.010a mantrajño mantrayām āsa pradānaṃ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1118: 1.032.010c deśe kāle pradānasya sadṛśe pratipādanam 1.032.011a etasminn eva kāle tu cūlī nāma mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1119: 1.032.011c ūrdhvaretāḥ śubhācāro brāhmaṃ tapa upāgamat 1.032.012a tapyantaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tatra gandharvī paryupāsate
GE09ram_01_u:1120: 1.032.012c somadā nāma bhadraṃ te ūrmilā tanayā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1121: 1.032.013a sā ca taṃ praṇatā bhūtvā śuśrūṣaṇaparāyaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:1122: 1.032.013c uvāsa kāle dharmiṣṭhā tasyās tuṣṭo 'bhavad guruḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1123: 1.032.014a sa ca tāṃ kālayogena provāca raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1124: 1.032.014c parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te kiṃ karomi tava priyam
GE09ram_01_u:1125: 1.032.015a parituṣṭaṃ muniṃ jñātvā gandharvī madhurasvaram 1.032.015c uvāca paramaprītā vākyajñā vākyakovidam
GE09ram_01_u:1126: 1.032.016a lakṣmyā samudito brāhmyā brahmabhūto mahātapāḥ 1.032.016c brāhmeṇa tapasā yuktaṃ putram icchāmi dhārmikam
GE09ram_01_u:1127: 1.032.017a apatiś cāsmi bhadraṃ te bhāryā cāsmi na kasya cit
GE09ram_01_u:1128: 1.032.017c brāhmeṇopagatāyāś ca dātum arhasi me sutam
GE09ram_01_u:1129: 1.032.018a tasyāḥ prasanno brahmarṣir dadau putram anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1130: 1.032.018c brahmadatta iti khyātaṃ mānasaṃ cūlinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:1131: 1.032.019a sa rājā brahmadattas tu purīm adhyavasat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1132: 1.032.019c kāmpilyāṃ parayā lakṣmyā devarājo yathā divam
GE09ram_01_u:1133: 1.032.020a sa buddhiṃ kṛtavān rājā kuśanābhaḥ sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1134: 1.032.020c brahmadattāya kākutstha dātuṃ kanyāśataṃ tadā 1.032.021a tam āhūya mahātejā brahmadattaṃ mahīpatiḥ 1.032.021c dadau kanyāśataṃ rājā suprītenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1135: 1.032.022a yathākramaṃ tataḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha raghunandana 1.032.022c brahmadatto mahī pālas tāsāṃ devapatir yathā
GE09ram_01_u:1136: 1.032.023a spṛṣṭamātre tataḥ pāṇau vikubjā vigatajvarāḥ 1.032.023c yuktāḥ paramayā lakṣmyā babhuḥ kanyāśataṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1137: 1.032.024a sa dṛṣṭvā vāyunā muktāḥ kuśanābho mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1138: 1.032.024c babhūva paramaprīto harṣaṃ lebhe punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1139: 1.032.025a kṛtodvāhaṃ tu rājānaṃ brahmadattaṃ mahīpatiḥ 1.032.025c sadāraṃ preṣayām āsa sopādhyāya gaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1140: 1.032.026a somadāpi susaṃhṛṣṭā putrasya sadṛśīṃ kriyām 1.032.026c yathānyāyaṃ ca gandharvī snuṣās tāḥ pratyanandata
GE09ram_01_u:1141: 1.033.001a kṛtodvāhe gate tasmin brahmadatte ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1142: 1.033.001c aputraḥ putralābhāya pautrīm iṣṭim akalpayat 1.033.002a iṣṭyāṃ tu vartamānāyāṃ kuśanābhaṃ mahīpatim 1.033.002c uvāca paramaprītaḥ kuśo brahmasutas tadā 1.033.003a putras te sadṛśaḥ putra bhaviṣyati sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1143: 1.033.003c gādhiṃ prāpsyasi tena tvaṃ kīrtiṃ loke ca śāśvatīm 1.033.004a evam uktvā kuśo rāma kuśanābhaṃ mahīpatim
GE09ram_01_u:1145: 1.033.005a kasya cit tv atha kālasya kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1146: 1.033.005c jajñe paramadharmiṣṭho gādhir ity eva nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1147: 1.033.006a sa pitā mama kākutstha gādhiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1148: 1.033.006c kuśavaṃśaprasūto 'smi kauśiko raghunandana 1.033.007a pūrvajā bhaginī cāpi mama rāghava suvratā
GE09ram_01_u:1149: 1.033.007c nāmnā satyavatī nāma ṛcīke pratipāditā 1.033.008a saśarīrā gatā svargaṃ bhartāram anuvartinī 1.033.008c kauśikī paramodārā sā pravṛttā mahānadī 1.033.009a divyā puṇyodakā ramyā himavantam upāśritā 1.033.009c lokasya hitakāmārthaṃ pravṛttā bhaginī mama 1.033.010a tato 'haṃ himavatpārśve vasāmi niyataḥ sukham
GE09ram_01_u:1151: 1.033.011a sā tu satyavatī puṇyā satye dharme pratiṣṭhitā
GE09ram_01_u:1152: 1.033.011c pativratā mahābhāgā kauśikī saritāṃ varā 1.033.012a ahaṃ hi niyamād rāma hitvā tāṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1153: 1.033.012c siddhāśramam anuprāpya siddho 'smi tava tejasā 1.033.013a eṣā rāma mamotpattiḥ svasya vaṃśasya kīrtitā
GE09ram_01_u:1154: 1.033.013c deśasya ca mahābāho yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_01_u:1156: 1.033.014c nidrām abhyehi bhadraṃ te mā bhūd vighno 'dhvanīha naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1157: 1.033.015a niṣpandās taravaḥ sarve nilīnā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 1.033.015c naiśena tamasā vyāptā diśaś ca raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1158: 1.033.016a śanair viyujyate saṃdhyā nabho netrair ivāvṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:1160: 1.033.017a uttiṣṭhati ca śītāṃśuḥ śaśī lokatamonudaḥ 1.033.017c hlādayan prāṇināṃ loke manāṃsi prabhayā vibho
GE09ram_01_u:1161: 1.033.018a naiśāni sarvabhūtāni pracaranti tatas tataḥ 1.033.018c yakṣarākṣasasaṃghāś ca raudrāś ca piśitāśanāḥ 1.033.019a evam uktvā mahātejā virarāma mahāmuniḥ 1.033.019c sādhu sādhv iti taṃ sarve munayo hy abhyapūjayan 1.033.020a rāmo 'pi saha saumitriḥ kiṃ cid āgatavismayaḥ 1.033.020c praśasya muniśārdūlaṃ nidrāṃ samupasevate
GE09ram_01_u:1162: 1.034.001a upāsya rātriśeṣaṃ tu śoṇākūle maharṣibhiḥ 1.034.001c niśāyāṃ suprabhātāyāṃ viśvāmitro
GE09ram_01_u:1163: 1.034.002a suprabhātā niśā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
GE09ram_01_u:1165: 1.034.003a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīṃ kriyām
GE09ram_01_u:1166: 1.034.003c gamanaṃ rocayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1167: 1.034.004a ayaṃ śoṇaḥ śubhajalo gādhaḥ pulinamaṇḍitaḥ 1.034.004c katareṇa pathā brahman saṃtariṣyāmahe vayam 1.034.005a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa viśvāmitro 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_01_u:1168: 1.034.005c eṣa panthā mayoddiṣṭo yena yānti maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1169: 1.034.006a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ gate 'rdhadivase tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1170: 1.034.006c jāhnavīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ dadṛśur munisevitām 1.034.007a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇyasalilāṃ
GE09ram_01_u:1171: 1.034.007c babhūvur muditāḥ sarve munayaḥ saharāghavāḥ 1.034.007e tasyās tīre tataś cakrus te āvāsaparigraham
GE09ram_01_u:1172: 1.034.008a tataḥ snātvā yathānyāyaṃ saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ 1.034.008c hutvā caivāgnihotrāṇi prāśya cāmṛtavad dhaviḥ 1.034.009a viviśur jāhnavītīre śucau muditamānasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1175: 1.034.010c bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:1176: 1.034.010e trailokyaṃ katham ākramya gatā nadanadīpatim 1.034.011a codito rāma vākyena viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.034.011c vṛddhiṃ janma ca gaṅgāyā vaktum evopacakrame
GE09ram_01_u:1177: 1.034.012a śailendro himavān nāma dhātūnām ākaro mahān
GE09ram_01_u:1178: 1.034.012c tasya kanyā dvayaṃ rāma rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:1179: 1.034.013a yā meruduhitā rāma tayor mātā sumadhyamā
GE09ram_01_u:1180: 1.034.013c nāmnā menā manojñā vai patnī himavataḥ priyā
GE09ram_01_u:1181: 1.034.014a tasyāṃ gaṅgeyam abhavaj jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
GE09ram_01_u:1182: 1.034.014c umā nāma dvitīyābhūt kanyā tasyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1183: 1.034.015a atha jyeṣṭhāṃ surāḥ sarve devatārthacikīrṣayā 1.034.015c śailendraṃ varayām āsur gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:1184: 1.034.016a dadau dharmeṇa himavāṃs tanayāṃ lokapāvanīm 1.034.016c svacchandapathagāṃ gaṅgāṃ
GE09ram_01_u:1187: 1.034.018a yā cānyā śailaduhitā kanyāsīd raghunandana 1.034.018c ugraṃ sā vratam āsthāya tapas tepe tapodhanā
GE09ram_01_u:1188: 1.034.019a ugreṇa tapasā yuktāṃ dadau śailavaraḥ sutām
GE09ram_01_u:1190: 1.034.020a ete te śaila rājasya sute lokanamaskṛte
GE09ram_01_u:1191: 1.034.020c gaṅgā ca saritāṃ śreṣṭhā umā devī ca rāghava 1.034.021a etat te dharmam ākhyātaṃ yathā tripathagā nadī
GE09ram_01_u:1192: 1.034.021c khaṃ gatā prathamaṃ tāta gatiṃ gatimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_01_u:1193: 1.035.001a ukta vākye munau tasminn ubhau rāghavalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_01_u:1194: 1.035.001c pratinandya kathāṃ vīrāv ūcatur munipuṃgavam 1.035.002a dharmayuktam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:1195: 1.035.002c duhituḥ śailarājasya jyeṣṭhāya vaktum arhasi 1.035.003a vistaraṃ vistarajño 'si divyamānuṣasaṃbhavam
GE09ram_01_u:1196: 1.035.003c trīn patho hetunā kena pāvayel lokapāvanī
GE09ram_01_u:1197: 1.035.004a kathaṃ gaṅgāṃ tripathagā viśrutā sariduttamā 1.035.004c triṣu lokeṣu dharmajña karmabhiḥ kaiḥ samanvitā
GE09ram_01_u:1198: 1.035.005a tathā bruvati kākutsthe viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ 1.035.005c nikhilena kathāṃ sarvām ṛṣimadhye nyavedayat 1.035.006a purā rāma kṛtodvāhaḥ śitikaṇṭho mahātapāḥ 1.035.006c dṛṣṭvā ca spṛhayā devīṃ maithunāyopacakrame 1.035.007a śitikaṇṭhasya devasya divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ gatam 1.035.007c na cāpi tanayo rāma tasyām āsīt paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:1200: 1.035.008c yad ihotpadyate bhūtaṃ kas tat pratisahiṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:1201: 1.035.009a abhigamya surāḥ sarve praṇipatyedam abruvan 1.035.009c devadeva mahādeva lokasyāsya hite rata 1.035.009e surāṇāṃ praṇipātena prasādaṃ kartum arhasi 1.035.010a na lokā dhārayiṣyanti tava tejaḥ surottama
GE09ram_01_u:1202: 1.035.010c brāhmeṇa tapasā yukto devyā saha tapaś cara
GE09ram_01_u:1204: 1.035.011c rakṣa sarvān imāṃl lokān nālokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1206: 1.035.012c bāḍham ity abravīt sarvān punaś cedam uvāca ha 1.035.013a dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tejas tejasy eva sahomayā
GE09ram_01_u:1207: 1.035.013c tridaśāḥ pṛthivī caiva nirvāṇam adhigacchatu 1.035.014a yad idaṃ kṣubhitaṃ sthānān mama tejo hy anuttamam 1.035.014c dhārayiṣyati kas tan me bruvantu surasattamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1208: 1.035.015a evam uktās tato devāḥ pratyūcur vṛṣabhadhvajam
GE09ram_01_u:1209: 1.035.015c yat tejaḥ kṣubhitaṃ hy etat tad dharā dhārayiṣyati 1.035.016a evam uktaḥ surapatiḥ pramumoca mahītale 1.035.016c tejasā pṛthivī yena vyāptā sagirikānanā 1.035.017a tato devāḥ punar idam ūcuś cātha hutāśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1210: 1.035.017c praviśa tvaṃ mahātejo raudraṃ vāyusamanvitaḥ 1.035.018a tad agninā punar vyāptaṃ saṃjātaḥ śvetaparvataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1213: 1.035.019a athomāṃ ca śivaṃ caiva devāḥ sarṣi gaṇās tadā 1.035.019c pūjayām āsur atyarthaṃ suprītamanasas tataḥ 1.035.020a atha śaila sutā rāma tridaśān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1215: 1.035.021a yasmān nivāritā caiva saṃgatā putrakāmyayā 1.035.021c apatyaṃ sveṣu dāreṣu notpādayitum arhatha 1.035.021e adya prabhṛti yuṣmākam aprajāḥ santu patnayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1216: 1.035.022a evam uktvā surān sarvāñ śaśāpa pṛthivīm api
GE09ram_01_u:1217: 1.035.022c avane naikarūpā tvaṃ bahubhāryā bhaviṣyasi 1.035.023a na ca putrakṛtāṃ prītiṃ matkrodhakaluṣī kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:1218: 1.035.023c prāpsyasi tvaṃ sudurmedhe mama putram anicchatī
GE09ram_01_u:1219: 1.035.024a tān sarvān vrīḍitān dṛṣṭvā surān surapatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1221: 1.035.025a sa gatvā tapa ātiṣṭhat pārśve tasyottare gireḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1222: 1.035.025c himavatprabhave śṛṅge saha devyā maheśvaraḥ 1.035.026a eṣa te vistaro rāma śailaputryā
GE09ram_01_u:1223: 1.035.026c gaṅgāyāḥ prabhavaṃ caiva śṛṇu me sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1224: 1.036.001a tapyamāne tapo deve devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:1227: 1.036.002c praṇipatya śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ 1.036.003a yo naḥ senāpatir deva datto bhagavatā purā
GE09ram_01_u:1228: 1.036.003c sa tapaḥ param āsthāya tapyate sma sahomayā
GE09ram_01_u:1229: 1.036.004a yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 1.036.004c saṃvidhatsva vidhānajña tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1231: 1.036.005c sāntvayan madhurair vākyais tridaśān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1232: 1.036.006a śailaputryā yad uktaṃ tan na prajāsyatha patniṣu
GE09ram_01_u:1233: 1.036.006c tasyā vacanam akliṣṭaṃ satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1234: 1.036.007a iyam ākāśagā gaṅgā yasyāṃ putraṃ hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1236: 1.036.008a jyeṣṭhā śailendraduhitā mānayiṣyati taṃ sutam 1.036.008c umāyās tad bahumataṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1237: 1.036.009a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtārthā raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1238: 1.036.009c praṇipatya surāḥ sarve pitāmaham apūjayan 1.036.010a te gatvā parvataṃ rāma kailāsaṃ dhātumaṇḍitam
GE09ram_01_u:1239: 1.036.010c agniṃ niyojayām āsuḥ putrārthaṃ sarvadevatāḥ 1.036.011a devakāryam idaṃ deva samādhatsva hutāśana 1.036.011c śailaputryāṃ mahātejo gaṅgāyāṃ teja utsṛja 1.036.012a devatānāṃ pratijñāya gaṅgām abhyetya pāvakaḥ 1.036.012c garbhaṃ dhāraya vai devi devatānām idaṃ priyam
GE09ram_01_u:1240: 1.036.013a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā divyaṃ rūpam adhārayat
GE09ram_01_u:1241: 1.036.013c sa tasyā mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā samantād avakīryata
GE09ram_01_u:1242: 1.036.014a samantatas tadā devīm abhyaṣiñcata pāvakaḥ 1.036.014c sarvasrotāṃsi pūrṇāni gaṅgāyā raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1243: 1.036.015a tam uvāca tato gaṅgā sarvadevapurohitam 1.036.015c aśaktā dhāraṇe deva tava tejaḥ samuddhatam
GE09ram_01_u:1247: 1.036.017a śrutvā tv agnivaco gaṅgā taṃ garbham atibhāsvaram
GE09ram_01_u:1248: 1.036.017c utsasarja mahātejāḥ srotobhyo hi tadānagha 1.036.018a yad asyā nirgataṃ tasmāt taptajāmbūnadaprabham 1.036.018c kāñcanaṃ dharaṇīṃ prāptaṃ hiraṇyam amalaṃ śubham
GE09ram_01_u:1249: 1.036.019a tāmraṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ caiva taikṣṇyād evābhijāyata 1.036.019c malaṃ tasyābhavat tatra trapusīsakam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1250: 1.036.020a tad etad dharaṇīṃ prāpya nānādhātur avardhata
GE09ram_01_u:1251: 1.036.021a nikṣiptamātre garbhe tu tejobhir abhirañjitam 1.036.021c sarvaṃ parvatasaṃnaddhaṃ sauvarṇam abhavad vanam 1.036.022a jātarūpam iti khyātaṃ tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1253: 1.036.023a taṃ kumāraṃ tato jātaṃ sendrāḥ sahamarudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1255: 1.036.024a tāḥ kṣīraṃ jātamātrasya kṛtvā samayam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1256: 1.036.024c daduḥ putro 'yam asmākaṃ sarvāsām iti niścitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1257: 1.036.025a tatas tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ kārtikeya iti bruvan
GE09ram_01_u:1258: 1.036.025c putras trailokya vikhyāto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1259: 1.036.026a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā skannaṃ garbhaparisrave
GE09ram_01_u:1260: 1.036.026c snāpayan parayā lakṣmyā dīpyamānam ivānalam 1.036.027a skanda ity abruvan devāḥ skannaṃ garbhaparisravāt
GE09ram_01_u:1262: 1.036.028a prādurbhūtaṃ tataḥ kṣīraṃ kṛttikānām anuttamam 1.036.028c ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍānano bhūtvā jagrāha stanajaṃ payaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1263: 1.036.029a gṛhītvā kṣīram ekāhnā sukumāra vapus tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1264: 1.036.029c ajayat svena vīryeṇa daityasainyagaṇān vibhuḥ 1.036.030a surasenāgaṇapatiṃ tatas tam amaladyutim
GE09ram_01_u:1266: 1.036.031a eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
GE09ram_01_u:1267: 1.036.031c kumārasaṃbhavaś caiva dhanyaḥ puṇyas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1268: 1.037.001a tāṃ kathāṃ kauśiko rāme nivedya madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_01_u:1269: 1.037.001c punar evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kākutstham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1270: 1.037.002a ayodhyādhipatiḥ śūraḥ pūrvam āsīn narādhipaḥ 1.037.002c sagaro nāma dharmātmā prajākāmaḥ sa cāprajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1271: 1.037.003a vaidarbhaduhitā rāma keśinī nāma nāmataḥ 1.037.003c jyeṣṭhā sagarapatnī sā dharmiṣṭhā satyavādinī 1.037.004a ariṣṭanemiduhitā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:1273: 1.037.005a tābhyāṃ saha tadā rājā patnībhyāṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1275: 1.037.006a atha varṣa śate pūrṇe tapasārādhito muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1276: 1.037.006c sagarāya varaṃ prādād bhṛguḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1278: 1.037.007c kīrtiṃ cāpratimāṃ loke prāpsyase puruṣarṣabha 1.037.008a ekā janayitā tāta putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:1280: 1.037.009a bhāṣamāṇaṃ naravyāghraṃ rājapatnyau prasādya tam 1.037.009c ūcatuḥ paramaprīte kṛtāñjalipuṭe tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1281: 1.037.010a ekaḥ kasyāḥ suto brahman kā bahūñ janayiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1282: 1.037.010c śrotum icchāvahe brahman satyam astu vacas tava
GE09ram_01_u:1283: 1.037.011a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhṛguḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1285: 1.037.012a eko vaṃśakaro vāstu bahavo vā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1286: 1.037.012c kīrtimanto mahotsāhāḥ kā vā kaṃ varam icchati
GE09ram_01_u:1287: 1.037.013a munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā keśinī raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1288: 1.037.013c putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ rāma jagrāha nṛpasaṃnidhau 1.037.014a ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi suparṇabhaginī tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1289: 1.037.014c mahotsāhān kīrtimato jagrāha sumatiḥ sutān 1.037.015a pradakṣiṇam ṛṣiṃ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca 1.037.015c jagāma svapuraṃ rājā sabhāryā raghunandana 1.037.016a atha kāle gate tasmiñ jyeṣṭhā putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_01_u:1290: 1.037.016c asamañja iti khyātaṃ keśinī sagarātmajam 1.037.017a sumatis tu naravyāghra garbhatumbaṃ vyajāyata 1.037.017c ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi tumbabhedād viniḥsṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1291: 1.037.018a ghṛtapūrṇeṣu kumbheṣu dhātryas tān samavardhayan 1.037.018c kālena mahatā sarve yauvanaṃ pratipedire 1.037.019a atha dīrgheṇa kālena rūpayauvanaśālinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1293: 1.037.020a sa ca jyeṣṭho naraśreṣṭha sagarasyātmasaṃbhavaḥ 1.037.020c bālān gṛhītvā tu jale sarayvā raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1294: 1.037.020e prakṣipya prahasan nityaṃ majjatas tān nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_01_u:1295: 1.037.021a paurāṇām ahite yuktaḥ pitrā nirvāsitaḥ purāt
GE09ram_01_u:1298: 1.037.023a tataḥ kālena mahatā matiḥ samabhijāyata 1.037.023c sagarasya naraśreṣṭha yajeyam iti niścitā 1.037.024a sa kṛtvā niścayaṃ rājā sopādhyāyagaṇas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1301: 1.038.001c uvāca paramaprīto muniṃ dīptam ivānalam 1.038.002a śrotum ichāmi bhadraṃ te vistareṇa kathām imām
GE09ram_01_u:1302: 1.038.002c pūrvako me kathaṃ brahman yajñaṃ vai samupāharat
GE09ram_01_u:1303: 1.038.003a viśvāmitras tu kākutstham uvāca prahasann iva
GE09ram_01_u:1304: 1.038.003c śrūyatāṃ vistaro rāma sagarasya mahātmanaḥ 1.038.004a śaṃkaraśvaśuro nāma himavān
GE09ram_01_u:1306: 1.038.005a tayor madhye pravṛtto 'bhūd yajñaḥ sa puruṣottama
GE09ram_01_u:1307: 1.038.005c sa hi deśo naravyāghra praśasto yajñakarmaṇi
GE09ram_01_u:1309: 1.038.006c aṃśumān akarot tāta sagarasya mate sthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1310: 1.038.007a tasya parvaṇi taṃ yajñaṃ yajamānasya vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1311: 1.038.007c rākṣasīṃ tanum āsthāya yajñiyāśvam apāharat 1.038.008a hriyamāṇe tu kākutstha tasminn aśve mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1312: 1.038.008c upādhyāya gaṇāḥ sarve yajamānam athābruvan 1.038.009a ayaṃ parvaṇi vegena yajñiyāśvo
GE09ram_01_u:1313: 1.038.009c hartāraṃ jahi kākutstha hayaś caivopanīyatām 1.038.010a yajñac chidraṃ bhavaty etat sarveṣām aśivāya naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1314: 1.038.010c tat tathā kriyatāṃ rājan yathāchidraḥ kratur bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:1315: 1.038.011a upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā tasmin sadasi pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1316: 1.038.011c ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1317: 1.038.012a gatiṃ putrā na paśyāmi rakṣasāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1318: 1.038.012c mantrapūtair mahābhāgair āsthito hi mahākratuḥ 1.038.013a tad gacchata vicinvadhvaṃ putrakā bhadram astu vaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1320: 1.038.014a ekaikaṃ yojanaṃ putrā vistāram abhigacchata 1.038.015a yāvat turagasaṃdarśas tāvat khanata medinīm 1.038.015c tam eva hayahartāraṃ mārgamāṇā mamājñayā 1.038.016a dīkṣitaḥ pautrasahitaḥ sopādhyāyagaṇo hy aham 1.038.016c iha sthāsyāmi bhadraṃ vo yāvat turagadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1321: 1.038.017a ity uktvā hṛṣṭamanaso rājaputrā mahābalāḥ 1.038.017c jagmur mahītalaṃ rāma pitur vacanayantritāḥ 1.038.018a yojanāyām avistāram ekaiko dharaṇītalam
GE09ram_01_u:1323: 1.038.019a śūlair aśanikalpaiś ca halaiś cāpi sudāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1325: 1.038.020a nāgānāṃ vadhyamānānām asurāṇāṃ ca rāghava 1.038.020c rākṣasānāṃ ca durdharṣaḥ sattvānāṃ ninado 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:1326: 1.038.021a yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiṃ tu raghunandana 1.038.021c bibhidur dharaṇīṃ vīrā rasātalam anuttamam 1.038.022a evaṃ parvatasaṃbādhaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ nṛpātmajāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1328: 1.038.023a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ sāsurāḥ sahapannagāḥ 1.038.023c saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve pitāmaham upāgaman
GE09ram_01_u:1329: 1.038.024a te prasādya mahātmānaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanās tadā 1.038.024c ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastāḥ pitāmaham idaṃ vacaḥ 1.038.025a bhagavan pṛthivī sarvā khanyate sagarātmajaiḥ 1.038.025c bahavaś ca mahātmāno vadhyante jalacāriṇaḥ 1.038.026a ayaṃ yajñahano 'smākam anenāśvo 'panīyate
GE09ram_01_u:1330: 1.038.026c iti te sarvabhūtāni nighnanti sagarātmajaḥ 1.039.001a devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vai pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1332: 1.039.002a yasyeyaṃ vasudhā kṛtsnā vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ 1.039.002c kāpilaṃ rūpam āsthāya dhārayaty aniśaṃ dharām
GE09ram_01_u:1333: 1.039.003a pṛthivyāś cāpi nirbhedo dṛṣṭa eva sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1335: 1.039.004a pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā trayas triṃśad ariṃdamaḥ 1.039.004c devāḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭāḥ punar jagmur yathāgatam 1.039.005a sagarasya ca putrāṇāṃ prādur āsīn mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:1336: 1.039.005c pṛthivyāṃ bhidyamānāyāṃ nirghāta sama niḥsvanaḥ 1.039.006a tato bhittvā mahīṃ sarvāṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1337: 1.039.006c sahitāḥ sagarāḥ sarve pitaraṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:1338: 1.039.007a parikrāntā mahī sarvā sattvavantaś ca sūditāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1339: 1.039.007c devadānavarakṣāṃsi piśācoragakiṃnarāḥ 1.039.008a na ca paśyāmahe 'śvaṃ tam aśvahartāram eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1340: 1.039.008c kiṃ kariṣyāma bhadraṃ te buddhir atra vicāryatām
GE09ram_01_u:1341: 1.039.009a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ rājasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1342: 1.039.009c samanyur abravīd vākyaṃ sagaro raghunandana 1.039.010a bhūyaḥ khanata bhadraṃ vo nirbhidya vasudhātalam
GE09ram_01_u:1343: 1.039.010c aśvahartāram āsādya kṛtārthāś ca nivartatha 1.039.011a pitur vacanam āsthāya sagarasya mahātmanaḥ 1.039.011c ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi rasātalam abhidravan
GE09ram_01_u:1344: 1.039.012a khanyamāne tatas tasmin dadṛśuḥ parvatopamam 1.039.012c diśāgajaṃ virūpākṣaṃ dhārayantaṃ mahītalam
GE09ram_01_u:1346: 1.039.013c śirasā dhārayām āsa virūpākṣo mahāgajaḥ 1.039.014a yadā parvaṇi kākutstha viśramārthaṃ mahāgajaḥ 1.039.014c khedāc cālayate śīrṣaṃ bhūmikampas tadhā bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:1347: 1.039.015a taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā diśāpālaṃ mahāgajam
GE09ram_01_u:1348: 1.039.015c mānayanto hi te rāma jagmur bhittvā rasātalam
GE09ram_01_u:1349: 1.039.016a tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ bhittvā dakṣiṇāṃ bibhiduḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1350: 1.039.016c dakṣiṇasyām api diśi dadṛśus te mahāgajam
GE09ram_01_u:1352: 1.039.017c śirasā dhārayantaṃ te vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1353: 1.039.018a tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā sagarasya mahātmanaḥ 1.039.018c ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi paścimāṃ bibhidur diśam 1.039.019a paścimāyām api diśi mahāntam acalopamam 1.039.019c diśāgajaṃ saumanasaṃ dadṛśus te mahābalāḥ 1.039.020a taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā cāpi nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:1354: 1.039.020c khanantaḥ samupakrāntā diśaṃ somavatīṃ tadā 1.039.021a uttarasyāṃ raghuśreṣṭha dadṛśur himapāṇḍuram
GE09ram_01_u:1355: 1.039.021c bhadraṃ bhadreṇa vapuṣā dhārayantaṃ mahīm imām
GE09ram_01_u:1356: 1.039.022a samālabhya tataḥ sarve kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1358: 1.039.023a tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā sāgarāḥ prathitāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:1359: 1.039.023c roṣād abhyakhanan sarve pṛthivīṃ sagarātmajāḥ 1.039.024a dadṛśuḥ kapilaṃ tatra vāsudevaṃ sanātanam 1.039.024c hayaṃ ca tasya devasya carantam avidūrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1360: 1.039.025a te taṃ yajñahanaṃ jñātvā krodhaparyākulekṣaṇāḥ 1.039.025c abhyadhāvanta saṃkruddhās tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābruvan 1.039.026a asmākaṃ tvaṃ hi turagaṃ yajñiyaṃ hṛtavān asi
GE09ram_01_u:1361: 1.039.026c durmedhas tvaṃ hi saṃprāptān viddhi naḥ sagarātmajān
GE09ram_01_u:1362: 1.039.027a śrutvā tad vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kapilo raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1363: 1.039.027c roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭo huṃkāram akarot tadā 1.039.028a tatas tenāprameyena kapilena
GE09ram_01_u:1365: 1.040.001a putrāṃś ciragatāñ jñātvā sagaro raghunandana 1.040.001c naptāram abravīd rājā dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā 1.040.002a śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca pūrvais tulyo 'si tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:1367: 1.040.003a antarbhaumāni sattvāni vīryavanti mahānti ca 1.040.003c teṣāṃ tvaṃ pratighātārthaṃ sāsiṃ gṛhṇīṣva kārmukam
GE09ram_01_u:1368: 1.040.004a abhivādyābhivādyāṃs tvaṃ hatvā vighnakarān api 1.040.004c siddhārthaḥ saṃnivartasva mama yajñasya pāragaḥ 1.040.005a evam ukto 'ṃśumān samyak sagareṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1369: 1.040.005c dhanur ādāya khaḍgaṃ ca jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1370: 1.040.006a sa khātaṃ pitṛbhir mārgam antarbhaumaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1373: 1.040.008a sa taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā caiva nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:1374: 1.040.008c pitḥn sa paripapraccha vājihartāram eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1375: 1.040.009a diśāgajas tu tac chrutvā prītyāhāṃśumato vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1376: 1.040.009c āsamañjakṛtārthas tvaṃ sahāśvaḥ śīghram eṣyasi 1.040.010a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvān eva diśāgajān
GE09ram_01_u:1378: 1.040.011a taiś ca sarvair diśāpālair vākyajñair vākyakovidaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1379: 1.040.011c pūjitaḥ sahayaś caiva gantāsīty abhicoditaḥ 1.040.012a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1380: 1.040.012c bhasmarāśīkṛtā yatra pitaras tasya sāgarāḥ 1.040.013a sa duḥkhavaśam āpannas tv asamañjasutas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1381: 1.040.013c cukrośa paramārtas tu vadhāt teṣāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1382: 1.040.014a yajñiyaṃ ca hayaṃ tatra carantam avidūrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1385: 1.040.015c salilārthī mahātejā na cāpaśyaj jalāśayam 1.040.016a visārya nipuṇāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ tato 'paśyat khagādhipam
GE09ram_01_u:1386: 1.040.016c pitḥṇāṃ mātulaṃ rāma suparṇam anilopamam 1.040.017a sa cainam abravīd vākyaṃ vainateyo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1389: 1.040.018c salilaṃ nārhasi prājña dātum eṣāṃ hi laukikam
GE09ram_01_u:1390: 1.040.019a gaṅgā himavato jyeṣṭhā duhitā puruṣarṣabha 1.040.019c bhasmarāśīkṛtān etān pāvayel
GE09ram_01_u:1391: 1.040.020a tayā klinnam idaṃ bhasma gaṅgayā lokakāntayā
GE09ram_01_u:1393: 1.040.021a gaccha cāśvaṃ mahābhāga saṃgṛhya puruṣarṣabha 1.040.021c yajñaṃ paitāmahaṃ vīra nirvartayitum arhasi 1.040.022a suparṇavacanaṃ śrutvā so 'ṃśumān ativīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:1394: 1.040.022c tvaritaṃ hayam ādāya punar āyān mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1395: 1.040.023a tato rājānam āsādya dīkṣitaṃ raghunandana 1.040.023c nyavedayad yathāvṛttaṃ suparṇavacanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1396: 1.040.024a tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyam aṃśumato nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1397: 1.040.024c yajñaṃ nirvartayām āsa yathākalpaṃ yathāvidhi 1.040.025a svapuraṃ cāgamac chrīmān iṣṭayajño mahīpatiḥ 1.040.025c gaṅgāyāś cāgame rājā niścayaṃ nādhyagacchata 1.040.026a agatvā niścayaṃ rājā kālena mahatā mahān
GE09ram_01_u:1398: 1.040.026c triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ gataḥ 1.041.001a kāladharmaṃ gate rāma sagare prakṛtījanāḥ 1.041.001c rājānaṃ rocayām āsur aṃśumantaṃ sudhārmikam 1.041.002a sa rājā sumahān āsīd aṃśumān raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1399: 1.041.002c tasya putro mahān āsīd dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1400: 1.041.003a tasmin rājyaṃ samāveśya dilīpe raghunandana 1.041.003c himavacchikhare ramye tapas tepe sudāruṇam 1.041.004a dvādtriṃśac ca sahasrāṇi varṣāṇi sumahāyaśāḥ 1.041.004c tapovanagato rājā svargaṃ lebhe tapodhanaḥ 1.041.005a dilīpas tu mahātejāḥ śrutvā paitāmahaṃ vadham
GE09ram_01_u:1402: 1.041.006a kathaṃ gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ jalakriyā 1.041.006c tārayeyaṃ kathaṃ caitān iti cintā paro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:1403: 1.041.007a tasya cintayato nityaṃ dharmeṇa viditātmanaḥ 1.041.007c putro bhagīratho nāma jajñe paramadhārmikaḥ 1.041.008a dilīpas tu mahātejā yajñair bahubhir iṣṭavān
GE09ram_01_u:1405: 1.041.009a agatvā niścayaṃ rājā teṣām uddharaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:1407: 1.041.010a indralokaṃ gato rājā svārjitenaiva karmaṇā 1.041.010c ramye bhagīrathaṃ putram abhiṣicya nararṣabhaḥ 1.041.011a bhagīrathas tu rājarṣir dhārmiko raghunandana 1.041.011c anapatyo mahātejāḥ prajākāmaḥ sa cāprajaḥ 1.041.012a sa tapo dīrgham ātiṣṭhad gokarṇe raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:1409: 1.041.013a tasya varṣasahasrāṇi ghore tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ 1.041.013c suprīto bhagavān brahmā prajānāṃ patir īśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1410: 1.041.014a tataḥ suragaṇaiḥ sārdham upāgamya pitāmahaḥ 1.041.014c bhagīrathaṃ mahātmānaṃ tapyamānam athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1412: 1.041.015c tapasā ca sutaptena varaṃ varaya suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:1415: 1.041.017a yṛadi me bhagavān prīto yady asti tapasaḥ phalam 1.041.017c sagarasyātmajāḥ sarve mattaḥ salilam āpnuyuḥ 1.041.018a gaṅgāyāḥ salilaklinne bhasmany eṣāṃ mahātmanām 1.041.018c svargaṃ gaccheyur atyantaṃ sarve me prapitāmahāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1416: 1.041.019a deyā ca saṃtator deva nāvasīdet kulaṃ ca naḥ 1.041.019c ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule deva eṣa me 'stu varaḥ paraḥ 1.041.020a uktavākyaṃ tu rājānaṃ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1417: 1.041.020c pratyuvāca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ madhurāṃ madhurākṣarām 1.041.021a manoratho mahān eṣa bhagīratha mahāratha 1.041.021c evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te ikṣvākukulavardhana 1.041.022a iyaṃ haimavatī gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
GE09ram_01_u:1418: 1.041.022c tāṃ vai dhārayituṃ rājan haras tatra niyujyatām
GE09ram_01_u:1419: 1.041.023a gaṅgāyāḥ patanaṃ rājan pṛthivī na sahiṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:1420: 1.041.023c tau vai dhārayituṃ vīra nānyaṃ paśyāmi śūlinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1421: 1.041.024a tam evam uktvā rājānaṃ gaṅgāṃ cābhāṣya lokakṛt
GE09ram_01_u:1422: 1.041.024c jagāma tridivaṃ devaḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1424: 1.042.001c kṛtvā vasumatīṃ rāma saṃvatsaram upāsata 1.042.002a atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1425: 1.042.002c umāpatiḥ paśupatī rājānam idam abravīt 1.042.003a prītas te 'haṃ naraśreṣṭha kariṣyāmi tava priyam
GE09ram_01_u:1428: 1.042.004c tadā sātimahad rūpaṃ kṛtvā vegaṃ ca duḥsaham
GE09ram_01_u:1429: 1.042.004e ākāśād apatad rāma śive śivaśirasy uta
GE09ram_01_u:1430: 1.042.005a naiva sā nirgamaṃ lekhe jaṭāmaṇḍalamohitā 1.042.005c tatraivābabhramad devī saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn
GE09ram_01_u:1431: 1.042.006a anena toṣitaś cāsīd atyarthaṃ raghunandana 1.042.006c visasarja tato gaṅgāṃ haro bindusaraḥ prati
GE09ram_01_u:1432: 1.042.007a gaganāc chaṃkaraśiras tato dharaṇim āgatā 1.042.007c vyasarpata jalaṃ tatra
GE09ram_01_u:1433: 1.042.008a tato devarṣigandharvā yakṣāḥ siddhagaṇās tathā 1.042.008c vyalokayanta te tatra gaganād gāṃ gatāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1434: 1.042.009a vimānair nagarākārair hayair gajavarais tathā 1.042.009c pāriplavagatāś cāpi devatās tatra viṣṭhitāḥ 1.042.010a tad adbhutatamaṃ loke gaṅgā patanam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1438: 1.042.012a śiṃśumāroragagaṇair mīnair api ca cañcalaiḥ 1.042.012c vidyudbhir iva vikṣiptair ākāśam abhavat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1441: 1.042.014a kva cid drutataraṃ yāti kuṭilaṃ kva cid āyatam 1.042.014c vinataṃ kva cid uddhūtaṃ kva cid yāti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1442: 1.042.015a salilenaiva salilaṃ kva cid abhyāhataṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1443: 1.042.015c muhur ūrdhvapathaṃ gatvā papāta vasudhāṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1444: 1.042.016a tac chaṃkaraśirobhraṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ bhūmitale punaḥ 1.042.016c vyarocata tadā toyaṃ nirmalaṃ gatakalmaṣam 1.042.017a tatrarṣigaṇagandharvā vasudhātalavāsinaḥ 1.042.017c bhavāṅgapatitaṃ toyaṃ pavitram iti paspṛśuḥ 1.042.018a śāpāt prapatitā ye ca gaganād vasudhātalam
GE09ram_01_u:1445: 1.042.018c kṛtvā tatrābhiṣekaṃ te babhūvur gatakalmaṣāḥ 1.042.019a dhūpapāpāḥ punas tena toyenātha subhāsvatā 1.042.019c punar ākāśam āviśya svāṃl lokān pratipedire
GE09ram_01_u:1446: 1.042.020a mumude mudito lokas tena toyena bhāsvatā
GE09ram_01_u:1449: 1.042.021c prāyād agre mahātejās taṃ gaṅgā pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_01_u:1451: 1.042.022c gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ 1.042.023a sarvāś cāpsaraso rāma bhagīratharathānugāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1452: 1.042.023c gaṅgām anvagaman prītāḥ sarve jalacarāś ca ye
GE09ram_01_u:1453: 1.042.024a yato bhagīratho rājā tato gaṅgā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_01_u:1455: 1.043.001a sa gatvā sāgaraṃ rājā gaṅgayānugatas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1456: 1.043.001c praviveśa talaṃ bhūmer yatra te bhasmasātkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1457: 1.043.002a bhasmany athāplute rāma gaṅgāyāḥ salilena vai
GE09ram_01_u:1458: 1.043.002c sarva lokaprabhur brahmā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1459: 1.043.003a tāritā naraśārdūla divaṃ yātāś ca devavat
GE09ram_01_u:1461: 1.043.004a sāgarasya jalaṃ loke yāvat sthāsyati pārthiva
GE09ram_01_u:1462: 1.043.004c sagarasyātmajās tāvat svarge sthāsyanti devavat 1.043.005a iyaṃ ca duhitā jyeṣṭhā tava gaṅgā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1463: 1.043.005c tvatkṛtena ca nāmnā vai loke sthāsyati viśrutā
GE09ram_01_u:1464: 1.043.006a gaṅgā tripathagā nāma divyā bhāgīrathīti ca
GE09ram_01_u:1465: 1.043.006c tripatho bhāvayantīti tatas tripathagā smṛtā 1.043.007a pitāmahānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvam atra manujādhipa 1.043.007c kuruṣva salilaṃ rājan pratijñām apavarjaya 1.043.008a pūrvakeṇa hi te rājaṃs tenātiyaśasā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1466: 1.043.008c dharmiṇāṃ pravareṇātha naiṣa prāpto manorathaḥ 1.043.009a tathaivāṃśumatā tāta loke 'pratimatejasā
GE09ram_01_u:1467: 1.043.009c gaṅgāṃ prārthayatā netuṃ pratijñā nāpavarjitā 1.043.010a rājarṣiṇā guṇavatā
GE09ram_01_u:1470: 1.043.011c punar na śaṅkitā netuṃ gaṅgāṃ prārthayatānagha
GE09ram_01_u:1471: 1.043.012a sā tvayā samatikrāntā pratijñā puruṣarṣabha 1.043.012c prāpto 'si paramaṃ loke yaśaḥ paramasaṃmatam
GE09ram_01_u:1472: 1.043.013a yac ca gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ tvayā kṛtam ariṃdama
GE09ram_01_u:1473: 1.043.013c anena ca bhavān prāpto dharmasyāyatanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:1474: 1.043.014a plāvayasva tvam ātmānaṃ narottama sadocite 1.043.014c salile puruṣavyāghra śuciḥ puṇyaphalo bhava 1.043.015a pitāmahānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kuruṣva salilakriyām
GE09ram_01_u:1475: 1.043.015c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi svaṃ lokaṃ gamyatāṃ nṛpa 1.043.016a ity evam uktvā deveśaḥ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ 1.043.016c yathāgataṃ tathāgacchad devalokaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1478: 1.043.017e kṛtodakaḥ śucī rājā svapuraṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:1479: 1.043.018a samṛddhārtho naraśreṣṭha svarājyaṃ praśaśāsa ha 1.043.018c pramumoda ca lokas taṃ nṛpam āsādya rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1481: 1.043.019a eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
GE09ram_01_u:1483: 1.043.020a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ putryam athāpi ca
GE09ram_01_u:1484: 1.043.020c idam ākhyānam ākhyātaṃ gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ mayā 1.044.001a viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1485: 1.044.001c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā viśvāmitram athābravīt 1.044.002a atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:1486: 1.044.002c gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ sāgarasya ca pūraṇam 1.044.003a tasya sā śarvarī sarvā saha saumitriṇā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1488: 1.044.004a tataḥ prabhāte vimale viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim 1.044.004c uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ kṛtāhnikam ariṃdamaḥ 1.044.005a gatā bhagavatī rātriḥ śrotavyaṃ paramaṃ śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:1489: 1.044.005c kṣaṇabhūteva sā rātriḥ saṃvṛtteyaṃ mahātapaḥ 1.044.005e imāṃ cintayataḥ sarvāṃ nikhilena kathāṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:1490: 1.044.006a tarāma saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ puṇyāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:1491: 1.044.006c naur eṣā hi sukhāstīrṇā ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE09ram_01_u:1492: 1.044.006e bhagavantam iha prāptaṃ jñātvā tvaritam āgatā
GE09ram_01_u:1493: 1.044.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1494: 1.044.007c saṃtāraṃ kārayām āsa sarṣisaṃghaḥ sarāghavaḥ 1.044.008a uttaraṃ tīram āsādya saṃpūjyarṣigaṇaṃ tatha 1.044.008c gaṅgākūle niviṣṭās te viśālāṃ dadṛśuḥ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:1495: 1.044.009a tato munivaras tūrṇaṃ jagāma saharāghavaḥ 1.044.009c viśālāṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ divyāṃ svargopamāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1496: 1.044.010a atha rāmo mahāprājño viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim 1.044.010c papraccha prāñjalir bhūtvā viśālām uttamāṃ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:1497: 1.044.011a kataro rājavaṃśo 'yaṃ viśālāyāṃ mahāmune 1.044.011c śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me 1.044.012a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasya munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1498: 1.044.012c ākhyātuṃ tat samārebhe viśālasya purātanam 1.044.013a śrūyatāṃ rāma śakrasya kathāṃ kathayataḥ śubhām
GE09ram_01_u:1499: 1.044.013c asmin deśe hi yad vṛttaṃ śṛṇu tattvena rāghava 1.044.014a pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1500: 1.044.014c aditeś ca mahābhāgā vīryavantaḥ sudhārmikāḥ 1.044.015a tatas teṣāṃ naraśreṣṭha buddhir āsīn mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:1501: 1.044.015c amarā nirjarāś caiva kathaṃ syāma nirāmayāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1502: 1.044.016a teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ rāma buddhir āsīd vipaścitām
GE09ram_01_u:1503: 1.044.016c kṣīrodamathanaṃ kṛtvā rasaṃ prāpsyāma tatra vai
GE09ram_01_u:1504: 1.044.017a tato niścitya mathanaṃ yoktraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
GE09ram_01_u:1505: 1.044.017c manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā mamanthur amitaujasaḥ 1.044.018a atha dhanvantarir nāma apsarāś ca suvarcasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1506: 1.044.018c apsu nirmathanād eva rasāt tasmād varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1509: 1.044.019c asaṃkhyeyās tu kākutstha yās tāsāṃ paricārikāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1510: 1.044.020a na tāḥ sma pratigṛhṇanti sarve te devadānavāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1511: 1.044.020c apratigrahaṇāc caiva tena sādhāraṇāḥ smṛtāḥ 1.044.021a varuṇasya tataḥ kanyā vāruṇī raghunandana 1.044.021c utpapāta mahābhāgā mārgamāṇā parigraham
GE09ram_01_u:1512: 1.044.022a diteḥ putrā na tāṃ rāma jagṛhur varuṇātmajām
GE09ram_01_u:1513: 1.044.022c adites tu sutā vīra jagṛhus tām aninditām
GE09ram_01_u:1514: 1.044.023a asurās tena daiteyāḥ surās tenāditeḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1515: 1.044.023c hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāś cāsan vāruṇī grahaṇāt surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1516: 1.044.024a uccaiḥśravā hayaśreṣṭho maṇiratnaṃ ca kaustubham 1.044.024c udatiṣṭhan naraśreṣṭha tathaivāmṛtam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:1517: 1.044.025a atha tasya kṛte rāma mahān āsīt kulakṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1518: 1.044.025c adites tu tataḥ putrā diteḥ putrāṇa sūdayan
GE09ram_01_u:1519: 1.044.026a aditer ātmajā vīrā diteḥ putrān nijaghnire
GE09ram_01_u:1520: 1.044.026c tasmin ghore mahāyuddhe daiteyādityayor bhṛśam 1.044.027a nihatya ditiputrāṃs tu rājyaṃ prāpya puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1521: 1.044.027c śaśāsa mudito lokān sarṣisaṃghān sacāraṇān 1.045.001a hateṣu teṣu putreṣu ditiḥ paramaduḥkhitā 1.045.001c mārīcaṃ kāśyapaṃ rāma bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1522: 1.045.002a hataputrāsmi bhagavaṃs tava putrair mahābalaiḥ 1.045.002c śakrahantāram icchāmi putraṃ dīrghatapo'rjitam
GE09ram_01_u:1523: 1.045.003a sāhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmi garbhaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1524: 1.045.003c īdṛśaṃ śakrahantāraṃ tvam anujñātum arhasi 1.045.004a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā mārīcaḥ kāśyapas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1526: 1.045.005a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te śucir bhava tapodhane
GE09ram_01_u:1527: 1.045.005c janayiṣyasi putraṃ tvaṃ śakra hantāram āhave
GE09ram_01_u:1528: 1.045.006a pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śucir yadi bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:1529: 1.045.006c putraṃ trailokya hantāraṃ mattas tvaṃ janayiṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:1530: 1.045.007a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ pāṇinā sa mamārja tām
GE09ram_01_u:1531: 1.045.007c samālabhya tataḥ svastīty uktvā sa tapase yayau
GE09ram_01_u:1532: 1.045.008a gate tasmin naraśreṣṭha ditiḥ paramaharṣitā 1.045.008c kuśaplavanam āsādya tapas tepe sudāruṇam 1.045.009a tapas tasyāṃ hi kurvatyāṃ paricaryāṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:1534: 1.045.010a agniṃ kuśān kāṣṭham apaḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ tathaiva ca 1.045.010c nyavedayat sahasrākṣo yac cānyad api kāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:1536: 1.045.011c śakraḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu ditiṃ paricacāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:1537: 1.045.012a atha varṣasahasretu daśone raghu nandana 1.045.012c ditiḥ paramasaṃprītā sahasrākṣam
GE09ram_01_u:1538: 1.045.013a tapaś carantyā varṣāṇi daśa vīryavatāṃ vara
GE09ram_01_u:1539: 1.045.013c avaśiṣṭāni bhadraṃ te bhrātaraṃ drakṣyase tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1540: 1.045.014a tam ahaṃ tvatkṛte putra samādhāsye jayotsukam
GE09ram_01_u:1541: 1.045.014c trailokyavijayaṃ putra saha bhokṣyasi vijvaraḥ 1.045.015a evam uktvā ditiḥ śakraṃ prāpte madhyaṃ divākare
GE09ram_01_u:1542: 1.045.015c nidrayāpahṛtā devī pādau kṛtvātha śīrṣataḥ 1.045.016a dṛṣṭvā tām aśuciṃ śakraḥ pādataḥ kṛtamūrdhajām
GE09ram_01_u:1543: 1.045.016c śiraḥsthāne kṛtau pādau jahāsa ca mumoda ca
GE09ram_01_u:1544: 1.045.017a tasyāḥ śarīravivaraṃ viveśa ca puraṃdaraḥ 1.045.017c garbhaṃ ca saptadhā rāma bibheda paramātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:1545: 1.045.018a bidhyamānas tato garbho vajreṇa śataparvaṇā 1.045.018c ruroda susvaraṃ rāma tato ditir abudhyata
GE09ram_01_u:1546: 1.045.019a mā rudo mā rudaś ceti garbhaṃ śakro 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:1547: 1.045.019c bibheda ca mahātejā rudantam api vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1548: 1.045.020a na hantavyo na hantavya ity evaṃ ditir abravīt 1.045.020c niṣpapāta tataḥ śakro mātur vacanagauravāt 1.045.021a prāñjalir vajrasahito ditiṃ śakro 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:1549: 1.045.021c aśucir devi suptāsi pādayoḥ kṛtamūrdhajā 1.045.022a tadantaram ahaṃ labdhvā śakrahantāram āhave 1.045.022c abhindaṃ saptadhā devi tan me tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi 1.046.001a saptadhā tu kṛte garbhe ditiḥ paramaduḥkhitā
GE09ram_01_u:1551: 1.046.002a mamāparādhād garbho 'yaṃ saptadhā viphalīkṛtaḥ 1.046.002c nāparādho 'sti deveśa tavātra balasūdana
GE09ram_01_u:1552: 1.046.003a priyaṃ tu kṛtam icchāmi mama garbhaviparyaye
GE09ram_01_u:1553: 1.046.003c marutāṃ saptaṃ saptānāṃ sthānapālā bhavantv ime
GE09ram_01_u:1554: 1.046.004a vātaskandhā ime sapta carantu divi putrakāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1555: 1.046.004c mārutā iti vikhyātā divyarūpā mamātmajāḥ 1.046.005a brahmalokaṃ caratv eka indralokaṃ tathāparaḥ 1.046.005c divi vāyur iti khyātas tṛtīyo 'pi mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1556: 1.046.006a catvāras tu suraśreṣṭha diśo vai tava śāsanāt
GE09ram_01_u:1557: 1.046.006c saṃcariṣyanti bhadraṃ te devabhūtā mamātmajāḥ 1.046.006e tvatkṛtenaiva nāmnā ca mārutā iti viśrutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1558: 1.046.007a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ 1.046.007c uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ ditiṃ balaniṣūdanaḥ 1.046.008a sarvam etad yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1559: 1.046.008c vicariṣyanti bhadraṃ te devabhūtās tavātmajāḥ 1.046.009a evaṃ tau niścayaṃ kṛtvā mātāputrau tapovane
GE09ram_01_u:1560: 1.046.009c jagmatus tridivaṃ rāma kṛtārthāv iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:1561: 1.046.010a eṣa deśaḥ sa kākutstha mahendrādhyuṣitaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:1562: 1.046.010c ditiṃ yatra tapaḥ siddhām evaṃ paricacāra saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1563: 1.046.011a ikṣvākos tu naravyāghra putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ 1.046.011c alambuṣāyām utpanno viśāla iti viśrutaḥ 1.046.012a tena cāsīd iha sthāne viśāleti purī kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:1564: 1.046.013a viśālasya suto rāma hemacandro mahābalaḥ 1.046.013c sucandra iti vikhyāto hemacandrād anantaraḥ 1.046.014a sucandratanayo rāma dhūmrāśva iti viśrutaḥ 1.046.014c dhūmrāśvatanayaś cāpi sṛñjayaḥ samapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:1565: 1.046.015a sṛñjayasya sutaḥ śrīmān sahadevaḥ pratāpavān 1.046.015c kuśāśvaḥ sahadevasya putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1567: 1.046.016c somadattasya putras tu kākutstha iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1568: 1.046.017a tasya putro mahātejāḥ saṃpraty eṣa purīm imām
GE09ram_01_u:1569: 1.046.017c āvasaty amaraprakhyaḥ sumatir nāma durjayaḥ 1.046.018a ikṣvākos tu prasādena sarve vaiśālikā nṛpāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1571: 1.046.019a ihādya rajanīṃ rāma sukhaṃ vatsyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:1572: 1.046.019c śvaḥ prabhāte naraśreṣṭha janakaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:1573: 1.046.020a sumatis tu mahātejā viśvāmitram upāgatam 1.046.020c śrutvā naravaraśreṣṭhaḥ pratyudgacchan mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1574: 1.046.021a pūjāṃ ca paramāṃ kṛtvā sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1575: 1.046.021c prāñjaliḥ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā viśvāmitram athābravīt 1.046.022a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me viṣayaṃ mune
GE09ram_01_u:1576: 1.046.022c saṃprāpto darśanaṃ caiva nāsti dhanyataro mama
GE09ram_01_u:1577: 1.047.001a pṛṣṭvā tu kuśalaṃ tatra parasparasamāgame 1.047.001c kathānte sumatir vākyaṃ vyājahāra mahāmunim 1.047.002a imau kumārau bhadraṃ te devatulyaparākramau 1.047.002c gajasiṃhagatī vīrau śārdūlavṛṣabhopamau
GE09ram_01_u:1578: 1.047.003a padmapatraviśālākṣau khaḍgatūṇīdhanurdharau 1.047.003c aśvināv iva rūpeṇa samupasthitayauvanau
GE09ram_01_u:1579: 1.047.004a yadṛcchayaiva gāṃ prāptau devalokād ivāmarau 1.047.004c kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune 1.047.005a bhūṣayantāv imaṃ deśaṃ candrasūryāv ivāmbaram 1.047.005c parasparasya sadṛśau pramāṇeṅgitaceṣṭitaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1580: 1.047.006a kimarthaṃ ca naraśreṣṭhau saṃprāptau durgame pathi
GE09ram_01_u:1581: 1.047.006c varāyudhadharau vīrau śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ 1.047.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā yathāvṛtthaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_01_u:1582: 1.047.007c siddhāśramanivāsaṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ vadhaṃ tathā 1.047.008a viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1583: 1.047.008c atithī paramau prāptau putrau daśarathasya tau
GE09ram_01_u:1584: 1.047.008e pūjayām āsa vidhivat satkārārhau mahābalau 1.047.009a tataḥ paramasatkāraṃ sumateḥ prāpya rāghavau 1.047.009c uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ jagmatur mithilāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1585: 1.047.010a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve janakasya purīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_01_u:1586: 1.047.010c sādhu sādhv iti śaṃsanto mithilāṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:1587: 1.047.011a mithilopavane tatra āśramaṃ dṛśya rāghavaḥ 1.047.011c purāṇaṃ nirjanaṃ ramyaṃ papraccha munipuṃgavam 1.047.012a śrīmadāśramasaṃkāśaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ munivarjitam 1.047.012c śrotum icchāmi bhagavan kasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1588: 1.047.013a tac chrutā rāghaveṇoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākya viśāradaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1590: 1.047.014a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1591: 1.047.014c yasyaitad āśramapadaṃ śaptaṃ kopān mahātmanā 1.047.015a gautamasya naraśreṣṭha pūrvam āsīn mahātmanaḥ 1.047.015c āśramo divyasaṃkāśaḥ surair api supūjitaḥ 1.047.016a sa ceha tapa ātiṣṭhad ahalyāsahitaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:1593: 1.047.017a tasyāntaraṃ viditvā tu sahasrākṣaḥ śacīpatiḥ 1.047.017c muniveṣadharo 'halyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1595: 1.047.018c saṃgamaṃ tv aham icchāmi tvayā saha sumadhyame
GE09ram_01_u:1599: 1.047.020c kṛtārtho 'si suraśreṣṭha gaccha śīghram itaḥ prabho 1.047.020e ātmānaṃ māṃ ca deveśa sarvadā rakṣa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1600: 1.047.021a indras tu prahasan vākyam ahalyām idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1601: 1.047.021c suśroṇi parituṣṭo 'smi gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam 1.047.022a evaṃ saṃgamya tu tayā niścakrāmoṭajāt tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1602: 1.047.022c sa saṃbhramāt tvaran rāma śaṅkito gautamaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:1603: 1.047.023a gautamaṃ sa dadarśātha praviśanti mahāmunim 1.047.023c devadānavadurdharṣaṃ tapobalasamanvitam 1.047.023e tīrthodakapariklinnaṃ dīpyamānam ivānalam
GE09ram_01_u:1606: 1.047.025a atha dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaṃ muniveṣadharaṃ muniḥ 1.047.025c durvṛttaṃ vṛttasaṃpanno roṣād vacanam abravīt 1.047.026a mama rūpaṃ samāsthāya kṛtavān asi durmate
GE09ram_01_u:1607: 1.047.026c akartavyam idaṃ yasmād viphalas tvaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:1609: 1.047.027c petatur vṛṣaṇau bhūmau sahasrākṣasya tatkṣaṇāt 1.047.028a tathā śaptvā sa vai śakraṃ bhāryām api ca śaptavān
GE09ram_01_u:1610: 1.047.028c iha varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni tvaṃ nivatsyasi 1.047.029a vāyubhakṣā nirāhārā tapyantī
GE09ram_01_u:1612: 1.047.030a yadā caitad vanaṃ ghoraṃ rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1613: 1.047.030c āgamiṣyati durdharṣas tadā pūtā bhaviṣyasi 1.047.031a tasyātithyena durvṛtte
GE09ram_01_u:1614: 1.047.031c matsakāśe mudā yuktā svaṃ vapur dhārayiṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:1615: 1.047.032a evam uktvā mahātejā gautamo duṣṭacāriṇīm 1.047.032c imam āśramam utsṛjya siddhacāraṇasevite
GE09ram_01_u:1616: 1.047.032e himavacchikhare ramye tapas tepe mahātapāḥ 1.048.001a aphalas tu tataḥ śakro devān agnipurogamān
GE09ram_01_u:1618: 1.048.002a kurvatā tapaso vighnaṃ gautamasya mahātmanaḥ 1.048.002c krodham utpādya hi mayā surakāryam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:1619: 1.048.003a aphalo 'smi kṛtas tena krodhāt sā ca nirākṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:1621: 1.048.004a tan māṃ suravarāḥ sarve sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1622: 1.048.004c surasāhyakaraṃ sarve saphalaṃ kartum arhatha 1.048.005a śatakrator vacaḥ śrutvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ 1.048.005c pitṛdevān upetyāhuḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ 1.048.006a ayaṃ meṣaḥ savṛṣaṇaḥ śakro hy avṛṣaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1623: 1.048.006c meṣasya vṛṣaṇau gṛhya śakrāyāśu prayacchata 1.048.007a aphalas tu kṛto meṣaḥ parāṃ tuṣṭiṃ pradāsyati
GE09ram_01_u:1624: 1.048.007c bhavatāṃ harṣaṇārthāya ye ca dāsyanti mānavāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1625: 1.048.008a agnes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā pitṛdevāḥ samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1627: 1.048.009a tadā prabhṛti kākutstha pitṛdevāḥ samāgatāḥ 1.048.009c aphalān bhuñjate meṣān phalais teṣām ayojayan
GE09ram_01_u:1628: 1.048.010a indras tu meṣavṛṣaṇas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1629: 1.048.010c gautamasya prabhāvena tapasaś ca mahātmanaḥ 1.048.011a tadāgaccha mahāteja āśramaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:1632: 1.048.012c viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya āśramaṃ praviveśa ha 1.048.013a dadarśa ca mahābhāgāṃ tapasā dyotitaprabhām 1.048.013c lokair api samāgamya durnirīkṣyāṃ surāsuraiḥ 1.048.014a prayatnān nirmitāṃ dhātrā divyāṃ māyāmayīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:1636: 1.048.016a sa hi gautamavākyena durnirīkṣyā babhūva ha
GE09ram_01_u:1637: 1.048.016c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yāvad rāmasya darśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1638: 1.048.017a rāghavau tu tatas tasyāḥ pādau jagṛhatus tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1639: 1.048.017c smarantī gautamavacaḥ pratijagrāha sā ca tau
GE09ram_01_u:1640: 1.048.018a pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ cakāra susamāhitā 1.048.018c pratijagrāha kākutstho vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:1642: 1.048.019c gandharvāpsarasāṃ cāpi mahān āsīt samāgamaḥ 1.048.020a sādhu sādhv iti devās tām ahalyāṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:1645: 1.048.021c rāmaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat tapas tepe mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1647: 1.048.022c sakāśād vidhivat prāpya jagāma mithilāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1648: 1.049.001a tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_01_u:1650: 1.049.002a rāmas tu muniśārdūlam uvāca sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 1.049.002c sādhvī yajñasamṛddhir hi janakasya mahātmanaḥ 1.049.003a bahūnīha sahasrāṇi nānādeśanivāsinām
GE09ram_01_u:1653: 1.049.004c deśo vidhīyatāṃ brahman yatra vatsyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:1654: 1.049.005a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.049.005c niveśam akarod deśe vivikte salilāyute 1.049.006a viśvāmitraṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1656: 1.049.007a ṛtvijo 'pi mahātmānas tv arghyam ādāya satvaram 1.049.007c viśvāmitrāya dharmeṇa dadur mantrapuraskṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:1657: 1.049.008a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1658: 1.049.008c papraccha kuśalaṃ rājño yajñasya ca nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:1659: 1.049.009a sa tāṃś cāpi munīn pṛṣṭvā sopādhyāya purodhasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1660: 1.049.009c yathānyāyaṃ tataḥ sarvaiḥ samāgacchat prahṛṣṭavān 1.049.010a atha rājā muniśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata 1.049.010c āsane bhagavān āstāṃ sahaibhir munisattamaiḥ 1.049.011a janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā niṣasāda mahāmuniḥ 1.049.011c purodhā ṛtvijaś caiva rājā ca saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1662: 1.049.012c dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpatis tatra viśvāmitram athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1663: 1.049.013a adya yajñasamṛddhir me saphalā daivataiḥ kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:1664: 1.049.013c adya yajñaphalaṃ prāptaṃ bhagavaddarśanān mayā 1.049.014a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:1665: 1.049.014c yajñopasadanaṃ brahman prāpto 'si munibhiḥ saha 1.049.015a dvādaśāhaṃ tu brahmarṣe śeṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1666: 1.049.015c tato bhāgārthino devān draṣṭum arhasi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:1667: 1.049.016a ity uktvā muniśārdūlaṃ prahṛṣṭavadanas tadā 1.049.016c punas taṃ paripapraccha prāñjaliḥ prayato nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1668: 1.049.017a imau kumārau bhadraṃ te devatulyaparākramau 1.049.017c gajasiṃhagatī vīrau śārdūlavṛṣabhopamau
GE09ram_01_u:1669: 1.049.018a padmapatraviśālākṣau khaḍgatūṇīdhanurdharau 1.049.018c aśvināv iva rūpeṇa samupasthitayauvanau
GE09ram_01_u:1670: 1.049.019a yadṛcchayaiva gāṃ prāptau devalokād ivāmarau 1.049.019c kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune 1.049.020a varāyudhadharau vīrau kasya putrau mahāmune 1.049.020c bhūṣayantāv imaṃ deśaṃ candrasūryāv ivāmbaram 1.049.021a parasparasya sadṛśau pramāṇeṅgitaceṣṭitaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1671: 1.049.021c kākapakṣadharau vīrau śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ 1.049.022a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā janakasya mahātmanaḥ 1.049.022c nyavedayan mahātmānau putrau daśarathasya tau 1.049.023a siddhāśramanivāsaṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ vadhaṃ tathā 1.049.023c tac cāgamanam avyagraṃ viśālāyāś ca darśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1673: 1.049.024c mahādhanuṣi jijñāsāṃ kartum āgamanaṃ tathā 1.049.025a etat sarvaṃ mahātejā janakāya mahātmane 1.049.025c nivedya virarāmātha viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1674: 1.050.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ 1.050.001c hṛṣṭaromā mahātejāḥ śatānando mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1675: 1.050.002a gautamasya suto jyeṣṭhas tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ 1.050.002c rāmasaṃdarśanād eva paraṃ vismayam āgataḥ 1.050.003a sa tau niṣaṇṇau saṃprekṣya sukhāsīnau nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:1677: 1.050.004a api te muniśārdūla mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_01_u:1678: 1.050.004c darśitā rājaputrāya tapo dīrgham upāgatā 1.050.005a api rāme mahātejo mama mātā
GE09ram_01_u:1679: 1.050.005c vanyair upāharat pūjāṃ pūjārhe sarvadehinām 1.050.006a api rāmāya kathitaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ purātanam 1.050.006c mama mātur mahātejo devena duranuṣṭhitam 1.050.007a api kauśika bhadraṃ te guruṇā mama saṃgatā
GE09ram_01_u:1680: 1.050.007c mātā mama muniśreṣṭha rāmasaṃdarśanād itaḥ 1.050.008a api me guruṇā rāmaḥ pūjitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1681: 1.050.008c ihāgato mahātejāḥ pūjāṃ prāpya mahātmanaḥ 1.050.009a api śāntena manasā gurur me kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:1683: 1.050.010a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1685: 1.050.011a nātikrāntaṃ muniśreṣṭha yat kartavyaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:1686: 1.050.011c saṃgatā muninā patnī bhārgaveṇeva reṇukā 1.050.012a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1687: 1.050.012c śatānando mahātejā rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt 1.050.013a svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1690: 1.050.014c viśvāmitro mahātejā vetsy enaṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE09ram_01_u:1691: 1.050.015a nāsti dhanyataro rāma tvatto 'nyo bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:1692: 1.050.015c goptā kuśikaputras te yena taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1694: 1.050.016c yathābalaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE09ram_01_u:1695: 1.050.017a rājābhūd eṣa dharmātmā dīrgha kālam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1696: 1.050.017c dharmajñaḥ kṛtavidyaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1697: 1.050.018a prajāpatisutas tv āsīt kuśo nāma mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1698: 1.050.018c kuśasya putro balavān kuśanābhaḥ sudhārmikaḥ 1.050.019a kuśanābhasutas tv āsīd gādhir ity eva viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1699: 1.050.019c gādheḥ putro mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.050.020a viśvamitro mahātejāḥ pālayām āsa medinīm 1.050.020c bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi rājā rājyam akārayat
GE09ram_01_u:1700: 1.050.021a kadā cit tu mahātejā yojayitvā varūthinīm
GE09ram_01_u:1702: 1.050.022a nagarāṇi ca rāṣṭrāṇi saritaś ca tathā girīn
GE09ram_01_u:1703: 1.050.022c āśramān kramaśo rājā vicarann ājagāmaha 1.050.023a vasiṣṭhasyāśramapadaṃ nānāpuṣpaphaladrumam 1.050.023c nānāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ siddhacāraṇasevitam 1.050.024a devadānavagandharvaiḥ kiṃnarair upaśobhitam
GE09ram_01_u:1704: 1.050.024c praśāntahariṇākīrṇaṃ dvijasaṃghaniṣevitam 1.050.025a brahmarṣigaṇasaṃkīrṇaṃ devarṣigaṇasevitam 1.050.025c tapaścaraṇasaṃsiddhair agnikalpair mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1705: 1.050.026a satataṃ saṃkulaṃ śrīmad brahmakalpair mahātmabhiḥ 1.050.026c abbhakṣair vāyubhakṣaiś ca śīrṇaparṇāśanais tathā 1.050.027a phalamūlāśanair dāntair jitaroṣair jitendriyaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1708: 1.050.028c dadarśa jayatāṃ śreṣṭha viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ 1.051.001a sa dṛṣṭvā paramaprīto viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ 1.051.001c praṇato vinayād vīro vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_01_u:1709: 1.051.002a svāgataṃ tava cety ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1710: 1.051.002c āsanaṃ cāsya bhagavān vasiṣṭho vyādideśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:1711: 1.051.003a upaviṣṭāya ca tadā viśvāmitrāya dhīmate 1.051.003c yathānyāyaṃ munivaraḥ phalamūlam
GE09ram_01_u:1712: 1.051.004a pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ vasiṣṭhād rājasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1713: 1.051.004c tapo'gnihotraśiṣyeṣu kuśalaṃ paryapṛcchata 1.051.005a viśvāmitro mahātejā vanaspatigaṇe
GE09ram_01_u:1714: 1.051.005c sarvatra kuśalaṃ cāha vasiṣṭho rājasattamam 1.051.006a sukhopaviṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ viśvāmitraṃ mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1715: 1.051.006c papraccha japatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭho brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1716: 1.051.007a kaccit te kuśalaṃ rājan kaccid dharmeṇa rañjayan
GE09ram_01_u:1717: 1.051.007c prajāḥ pālayase rājan rājavṛttena dhārmika 1.051.008a kaccit te subhṛtā bhṛtyāḥ kaccit tiṣṭhanti śāsane
GE09ram_01_u:1718: 1.051.008c kaccit te vijitāḥ sarve ripavo ripusūdana
GE09ram_01_u:1719: 1.051.009a kaccid bale ca kośe ca mitreṣu ca paraṃtapa 1.051.009c kuśalaṃ te naravyāghra putrapautre tathānagha 1.051.010a sarvatra kuśalaṃ rājā vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyudāharat 1.051.010c viśvāmitro mahātejā vasiṣṭhaṃ vinayānvitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1720: 1.051.011a kṛtvobhau suciraṃ kālaṃ dharmiṣṭhau tāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1721: 1.051.011c mudā paramayā yuktau prīyetāṃ tau parasparam
GE09ram_01_u:1722: 1.051.012a tato vasiṣṭho bhagavān kathānte raghunandana 1.051.012c viśvāmitram idaṃ vākyam uvāca prahasann iva
GE09ram_01_u:1723: 1.051.013a ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi balasyāsya mahābala 1.051.013c tava caivāprameyasya yathārhaṃ saṃpratīccha me 1.051.014a satkriyāṃ tu bhavān etāṃ pratīcchatu mayodyatām
GE09ram_01_u:1724: 1.051.014c rājaṃs tvam atithiśreṣṭhaḥ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ 1.051.015a evam ukto vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitro mahāmatiḥ 1.051.015c kṛtam ity abravīd rājā pūjāvākyena me tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:1725: 1.051.016a phalamūlena bhagavan vidyate yat tavāśrame 1.051.016c pādyenācamanīyena bhagavaddarśanena
GE09ram_01_u:1726: 1.051.017a sarvathā ca mahāprājña pūjārheṇa supūjitaḥ 1.051.017c gamiṣyāmi namas te 'stu maitreṇekṣasva cakṣuṣā 1.051.018a evaṃ bruvantaṃ rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ punar eva hi
GE09ram_01_u:1727: 1.051.018c nyamantrayata dharmātmā punaḥ punar udāradhīḥ 1.051.019a bāḍham ity eva gādheyo vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1728: 1.051.019c yathā priyaṃ bhagavatas tathāstu munisattama 1.051.020a evam ukto mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1729: 1.051.020c ājuhāva tataḥ prītaḥ kalmāṣīṃ dhūtakalmaṣaḥ 1.051.021a ehy ehi śabale kṣipraṃ śṛṇu cāpi vaco mama 1.051.021c sabalasyāsya rājarṣeḥ kartuṃ vyavasito 'smy aham
GE09ram_01_u:1730: 1.051.021e bhojanena mahārheṇa satkāraṃ saṃvidhatsva me 1.051.022a yasya yasya yathākāmaṃ ṣaḍraseṣv abhipūjitam 1.051.022c tat sarvaṃ kāmadhug divye abhivarṣakṛte mama
GE09ram_01_u:1732: 1.051.023c annānāṃ nicayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛjasva śabale tvara
GE09ram_01_u:1733: 1.052.001a evam uktā vasiṣṭhena śabalā śatrusūdana 1.052.001c vidadhe kāmadhuk kāmān yasya yasya yathepsitam
GE09ram_01_u:1734: 1.052.002a ikṣūn madhūṃs tathā lājān maireyāṃś ca varāsavān
GE09ram_01_u:1735: 1.052.002c pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1737: 1.052.003c mṛṣṭānnāni ca sūpāś ca dadhikulyās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1738: 1.052.004a nānāsvādurasānāṃ ca ṣāḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca 1.052.004c bhājanāni supūrṇāni gauḍāni ca sahasraśaḥ 1.052.005a sarvam āsīt susaṃtuṣṭaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulam
GE09ram_01_u:1742: 1.052.007a sāmātyo mantrisahitaḥ sabhṛtyaḥ pūjitas tadā 1.052.007c yuktaḥ pareṇa harṣeṇa vasiṣṭham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1745: 1.052.009a gavāṃ śatasahasreṇa dīyatāṃ śabalā mama 1.052.009c ratnaṃ hi bhagavann etad ratnahārī ca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1746: 1.052.009e tasmān me śabalāṃ dehi mamaiṣā dharmato dvija
GE09ram_01_u:1747: 1.052.010a evam uktas tu bhagavān vasiṣṭho munisattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1749: 1.052.011a nāhaṃ śatasahasreṇa nāpi koṭiśatair gavām 1.052.011c rājan dāsyāmi śabalāṃ rāśibhī rajatasya vā
GE09ram_01_u:1750: 1.052.012a na parityāgam arheyaṃ matsakāśād ariṃdama 1.052.012c śāśvatī śabalā mahyaṃ kīrtir ātmavato yathā
GE09ram_01_u:1751: 1.052.013a asyāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca prāṇayātrā tathaiva ca 1.052.013c āyattam agnihotraṃ ca balir homas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1752: 1.052.014a svāhākāravaṣaṭkārau vidyāś ca vividhās tathā 1.052.014c āyattam atra rājarṣe sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1753: 1.052.015a sarva svam etat satyena mama tuṣṭikarī sadā
GE09ram_01_u:1754: 1.052.015c kāraṇair bahubhī rājan na dāsye śabalāṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:1757: 1.052.017a hairaṇyakakṣyāgraiveyān suvarṇāṅkuśabhūṣitān 1.052.017c dadāmi kuñjarāṇāṃ te sahasrāṇi caturdaśa 1.052.018a hairaṇyānāṃ rathānāṃ ca śvetāśvānāṃ caturyujām 1.052.018c dadāmi te śatāny aṣṭau kiṅkiṇīkavibhūṣitān 1.052.019a hayānāṃ deśajātānāṃ kulajānāṃ mahaujasām
GE09ram_01_u:1758: 1.052.019c sahasram ekaṃ daśa ca dadāmi tava suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:1760: 1.052.020c dadāmy ekāṃ gavāṃ koṭiṃ śabalā dīyatāṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:1761: 1.052.021a evam uktas tu bhagavān viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
