GE09ram_01_u:1762: 1.052.021c na dāsyāmīti śabalāṃ prāha rājan kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:1763: 1.052.022a etad eva hi me ratnam etad eva hi me dhanam
GE09ram_01_u:1764: 1.052.022c etad eva hi sarvasvam etad eva hi jīvitam 1.052.023a darśaś ca pūrṇamāsaś ca yajñāś caivāptadakṣiṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1765: 1.052.023c etad eva hi me rājan vividhāś ca kriyās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1766: 1.052.024a adomūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā mama rājan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1767: 1.052.024c bahūnāṃ kiṃ pralāpena na dāsye kāmadohinīm
GE09ram_01_u:1768: 1.053.001a kāmadhenuṃ vasiṣṭho 'pi yadā na tyajate muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1770: 1.053.002a nīyamānā tu śabalā rāma rājñā mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1771: 1.053.002c duḥkhitā cintayām āsa rudantī śokakarśitā 1.053.003a parityaktā vasiṣṭhena kim ahaṃ sumahātmanā 1.053.003c yāhaṃ rājabhṛtair dīnā hriyeyaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitā 1.053.004a kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ tasya maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ 1.053.004c yan mām anāgasaṃ bhaktām iṣṭāṃ tyajati dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1772: 1.053.005a iti sā cintayitvā tu niḥśvasya ca punaḥ punaḥ 1.053.005c jagāma vegena tadā vasiṣṭhaṃ paramaujasaṃ 1.053.006a nirdhūya tāṃs tadā bhṛtyāñ śataśaḥ śatrusūdana
GE09ram_01_u:1774: 1.053.007a śabalā sā rudantī ca krośantī cedam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1776: 1.053.008a bhagavan kiṃ parityaktā tvayāhaṃ brahmaṇaḥ suta
GE09ram_01_u:1777: 1.053.008c yasmād rājabhṛtā māṃ hi nayante tvatsakāśataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1778: 1.053.009a evam uktas tu brahmarṣir idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1780: 1.053.010a na tvāṃ tyajāmi śabale nāpi me 'pakṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:1781: 1.053.010c eṣa tvāṃ nayate rājā balān matto mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1782: 1.053.011a na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ mahyaṃ rājā tv adya viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1783: 1.053.011c balī rājā kṣatriyaś ca pṛthivyāḥ patir eva ca 1.053.012a iyam akṣauhiṇīpūrṇā
GE09ram_01_u:1785: 1.053.013a evam uktā vasiṣṭhena pratyuvāca vinītavat 1.053.013c vacanaṃ vacanajñā sā brahmarṣim amitaprabham 1.053.014a na balaṃ kṣatriyasyāhur brāhmaṇo balavattaraḥ 1.053.014c brahman brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ kṣatrāt tu balavattaram
GE09ram_01_u:1786: 1.053.015a aprameyabalaṃ tubhyaṃ na tvayā balavattaraḥ 1.053.015c viśvāmitro mahāvīryas tejas tava durāsadam 1.053.016a niyuṅkṣva māṃ mahātejas tvadbrahmabalasaṃbhṛtām
GE09ram_01_u:1787: 1.053.016c tasya darpaṃ balaṃ yat tan nāśayāmi durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1788: 1.053.017a ity uktas tu tayā rāma vasiṣṭhaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1790: 1.053.018a tasyā humbhāravotsṛṣṭāḥ pahlavāḥ śataśo nṛpa 1.053.018c nāśayanti balaṃ sarvaṃ viśvāmitrasya paśyataḥ 1.053.019a sa rājā paramakruddhaḥ krodhavisphāritekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1791: 1.053.019c pahlavān nāśayām āsa śastrair uccāvacair api
GE09ram_01_u:1792: 1.053.020a viśvāmitrārditān dṛṣṭvā pahlavāñ śataśas tadā 1.053.020c bhūya evāsṛjad ghorāñ śakān yavanamiśritān 1.053.021a tair āsīt saṃvṛtā bhūmiḥ śakair yavanamiśritaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1794: 1.053.022a dīrghāsipaṭṭiśadharair hemavarṇāmbarāvṛtaiḥ 1.053.022c nirdagdhaṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ pradīptair iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1796: 1.054.001a tatas tān ākulān dṛṣṭvā viśvāmitrāstramohitān 1.054.001c vasiṣṭhaś codayām āsa kāmadhuk sṛja yogataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1797: 1.054.002a tasyā humbhāravāj jātāḥ kāmbojā ravisaṃnibhāḥ 1.054.002c ūdhasas tv atha saṃjātāḥ pahlavāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1798: 1.054.003a yonideśāc ca yavanaḥ śakṛddeśāc chakās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1799: 1.054.003c romakūpeṣu mecchāś ca harītāḥ sakirātakāḥ 1.054.004a tais tan niṣūditaṃ sainyaṃ viśvamitrasya tatkṣaṇāt
GE09ram_01_u:1801: 1.054.005a dṛṣṭvā niṣūditaṃ sainyaṃ vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā 1.054.005c viśvāmitrasutānāṃ tu śataṃ nānāvidhāyudham
GE09ram_01_u:1802: 1.054.006a abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam 1.054.006c huṃkāreṇaiva tān sarvān nirdadāha mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1805: 1.054.008a dṛṣṭvā vināśitān putrān balaṃ ca sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1807: 1.054.009a saṃdura iva nirvego bhagnadaṃṣṭra ivoragaḥ 1.054.009c uparakta ivādityaḥ sadyo niṣprabhatāṃ gataḥ 1.054.010a hataputrabalo dīno lūnapakṣa iva dvijaḥ 1.054.010c hatadarpo hatotsāho nirvedaṃ samapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:1808: 1.054.011a sa putram ekaṃ rājyāya pālayeti niyujya ca
GE09ram_01_u:1812: 1.054.013a kena cit tv atha kālena deveśo vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1813: 1.054.013c darśayām āsa varado viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim 1.054.014a kimarthaṃ tapyase rājan brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:1814: 1.054.014c varado 'smi varo yas te kāṅkṣitaḥ so 'bhidhīyatām
GE09ram_01_u:1815: 1.054.015a evam uktas tu devena viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1816: 1.054.015c praṇipatya mahādevam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 1.054.016a yadi tuṣṭo mahādeva dhanurvedo mamānagha 1.054.016c sāṅgopāṅgopaniṣadaḥ sarahasyaḥ pradīyatām
GE09ram_01_u:1817: 1.054.017a yāni deveṣu cāstrāṇi dānaveṣu maharṣiṣu 1.054.017c gandharvayakṣarakṣaḥsu pratibhāntu
GE09ram_01_u:1818: 1.054.018a tava prasādād bhavatu devadeva mamepsitam 1.054.018c evam astv iti deveśo vākyam uktvā divaṃ gataḥ 1.054.019a prāpya cāstrāṇi rājarṣir viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ 1.054.019c darpeṇa mahatā yukto darpapūrṇo 'bhavat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:1819: 1.054.020a vivardhamāno vīryeṇa samudra iva parvaṇi 1.054.020c hatam eva tadā mene vasiṣṭham
GE09ram_01_u:1821: 1.054.021c yais tat tapovanaṃ sarvaṃ nirdagdhaṃ cāstratejasā
GE09ram_01_u:1822: 1.054.022a udīryamāṇam astraṃ tad viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ 1.054.022c dṛṣṭvā vipradrutā bhītā munayaḥ śataśo diśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1823: 1.054.023a vasiṣṭhasya ca ye śiṣyās tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1824: 1.054.023c vidravanti bhayād bhītā nānādigbhyaḥ sahasraśaḥ 1.054.024a vasiṣṭhasyāśramapadaṃ śūnyam āsīn mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1825: 1.054.024c muhūrtam iva niḥśabdam āsīd īriṇasaṃnibham 1.054.025a vadato vai vasiṣṭhasya mā bhaiṣṭeti muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1826: 1.054.025c nāśayāmy adya gādheyaṃ nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1827: 1.054.026a evam uktvā mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1828: 1.054.026c viśvāmitraṃ tadā vākyaṃ saroṣam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1829: 1.054.027a āśramaṃ cirasaṃvṛddhaṃ yad vināśitavān asi 1.054.027c durācāro 'si yan mūḍha tasmāt tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:1830: 1.054.028a ity uktvā paramakruddho daṇḍam udyamya satvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1831: 1.054.028c vidhūma iva kālāgnir yamadaṇḍam ivāparam 1.055.001a evam ukto vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ 1.055.001c āgneyam astram utkṣipya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1832: 1.055.002a vasiṣṭho bhagavān krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1833: 1.055.003a kṣatrabandho sthito 'smy eṣa yad balaṃ tad vidarśaya 1.055.003c nāśayāmy eṣa te darpaṃ śastrasya tava gādhija
GE09ram_01_u:1834: 1.055.004a kva ca te kṣatriyabalaṃ kva ca brahmabalaṃ mahat 1.055.004c paśya brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ mama kṣatriyapāṃsana 1.055.005a tasyāstraṃ gādhiputrasya ghoram āgneyam uttamam 1.055.005c brahmadaṇḍena tac chāntam agner vega ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_01_u:1835: 1.055.006a vāruṇaṃ caiva raudraṃ ca aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1836: 1.055.006c aiṣīkaṃ cāpi cikṣepa ruṣito gādhinandanaḥ 1.055.007a mānavaṃ mohanaṃ caiva gāndharvaṃ svāpanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1838: 1.055.008a śoṣaṇaṃ dāraṇaṃ caiva vajram astraṃ sudurjayam
GE09ram_01_u:1839: 1.055.008c brahmapāśaṃ kālapāśaṃ vāruṇaṃ pāśam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1840: 1.055.009a pinākāstraṃ ca dayitaṃ śuṣkārdre aśanī tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1841: 1.055.009c daṇḍāstram atha paiśācaṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathāiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1842: 1.055.010a dharmacakraṃ kālacakraṃ viṣṇucakraṃ tathaiva ca 1.055.010c vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ caiva astraṃ hayaśiras tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1843: 1.055.011a śaktidvayaṃ ca cikṣepa kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:1844: 1.055.011c vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca kālāstram atha dāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1845: 1.055.012a triśūlam astraṃ ghoraṃ ca kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1846: 1.055.012c etāny astrāṇi cikṣepa sarvāṇi raghunandana 1.055.013a vasiṣṭhe japatāṃ śreṣṭhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:1847: 1.055.013c tāni sarvāṇi daṇḍena grasate brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1848: 1.055.014a teṣu śānteṣu brahmāstraṃ kṣiptavān gādhinandanaḥ 1.055.014c tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1849: 1.055.015a devarṣayaś ca saṃbhrāntā gandharvāḥ samahoragāḥ 1.055.015c trailokyam āsīt saṃtrastaṃ brahmāstre samudīrite 1.055.016a tad apy astraṃ mahāghoraṃ brāhmaṃ brāhmeṇa tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:1850: 1.055.016c vasiṣṭho grasate sarvaṃ brahmadaṇḍena rāghava 1.055.017a brahmāstraṃ grasamānasya vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1851: 1.055.017c trailokyamohanaṃ raudraṃ rūpam āsīt sudāruṇam 1.055.018a romakūpeṣu sarveṣu vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1852: 1.055.018c marīcya iva niṣpetur agner dhūmākulārciṣaḥ 1.055.019a prājvalad brahmadaṇḍaś ca vasiṣṭhasya karodyataḥ 1.055.019c vidhūma iva kālāgnir yamadaṇḍa ivāparaḥ 1.055.020a tato 'stuvan munigaṇā vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_01_u:1853: 1.055.020c amoghaṃ te balaṃ brahmaṃs tejo dhāraya tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:1854: 1.055.021a nigṛhītas tvayā brahman viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ 1.055.021c prasīda japatāṃ śreṣṭha lokāḥ santu gatavyathāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1855: 1.055.022a evam ukto mahātejāḥ śamaṃ cakre mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1857: 1.055.023a dhig balaṃ kṣatriyabalaṃ brahmatejobalaṃ balam 1.055.023c ekena brahmadaṇḍena sarvāstrāṇi hatāni me 1.055.024a tad etat samavekṣyāhaṃ prasannendriyamānasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1858: 1.055.024c tapo mahat samāsthāsye yad vai brahmatvakārakam
GE09ram_01_u:1859: 1.056.001a tataḥ saṃtaptahṛdayaḥ smaran nigraham ātmanaḥ 1.056.001c viniḥśvasya viniḥśvasya kṛtavairo mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1860: 1.056.002a sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ gatvā mahiṣyā saha rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1861: 1.056.002c tatāpa paramaṃ ghoraṃ viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ 1.056.002e phalamūlāśano dāntaś cacāra paramaṃ tapaḥ 1.056.003a athāsya jajñire putrāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1863: 1.056.004a pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ 1.056.004c abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam 1.056.005a jitā rājarṣilokās te tapasā kuśikātmaja 1.056.005c anena tapasā tvāṃ hi rājarṣir iti vidmahe
GE09ram_01_u:1864: 1.056.006a evam uktvā mahātejā jagāma saha daivataiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1866: 1.056.007a viśvāmitro 'pi tac chrutvā hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1867: 1.056.007c duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ samanyur idam abravīt 1.056.008a tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ rājarṣir iti māṃ viduḥ 1.056.008c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāsti manye tapaḥphalam
GE09ram_01_u:1868: 1.056.009a evaṃ niścitya manasā bhūya eva mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1869: 1.056.009c tapaś cacāra kākutstha paramaṃ paramātmavān 1.056.010a etasminn eva kāle tu satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1870: 1.056.010c triśaṅkur iti vikhyāta ikṣvāku kulanandanaḥ 1.056.011a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā yajeyam iti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:1871: 1.056.011c gaccheyaṃ svaśarīreṇa devānāṃ paramāṃ gatim 1.056.012a sa vasiṣṭhaṃ samāhūya kathayām āsa cintitam
GE09ram_01_u:1872: 1.056.012c aśakyam iti cāpy ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1873: 1.056.013a pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena sa yayau dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:1874: 1.056.013c vasiṣṭhā dīrgha tapasas tapo yatra hi tepire
GE09ram_01_u:1877: 1.056.015a so 'bhigamya mahātmānaḥ sarvān eva guroḥ sutān 1.056.015c abhivādyānupūrvyeṇa hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ 1.056.015e abravīt sumahātejāḥ sarvān eva kṛtāñjaliḥ 1.056.016a śaraṇaṃ vaḥ prapadye 'haṃ śaraṇyāñ śaraṇāgataḥ 1.056.016c pratyākhyāto 'smi bhadraṃ vo vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:1878: 1.056.017a yaṣṭukāmo mahāyajñaṃ tad anujñātum arthatha 1.056.017c guruputrān ahaṃ sarvān namaskṛtya prasādaye 1.056.018a śirasā praṇato yāce brāhmaṇāṃs tapasi sthitān
GE09ram_01_u:1879: 1.056.018c te māṃ bhavantaḥ siddhyarthaṃ yājayantu samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1880: 1.056.018e saśarīro yathāhaṃ hi devalokam avāpnuyām 1.056.019a pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena gatim anyāṃ tapodhanāḥ 1.056.019c guruputrān ṛte sarvān nāhaṃ paśyāmi kāṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:1881: 1.056.020a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1882: 1.056.020c tasmād anantaraṃ sarve bhavanto daivataṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:1883: 1.057.001a tatas triśaṅkor vacanaṃ śrutvā krodhasamanvitam 1.057.001c ṛṣiputraśataṃ rāma rājānam idam abravīt 1.057.002a pratyākhyāto 'si durbuddhe guruṇā satyavādinā
GE09ram_01_u:1884: 1.057.002c taṃ kathaṃ samatikramya śākhāntaram upeyivān 1.057.003a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1885: 1.057.003c na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ 1.057.004a aśakyam iti covāca vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1886: 1.057.004c taṃ vayaṃ vai samāhartuṃ kratuṃ śaktāḥ kathaṃ tava 1.057.005a bāliśas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1887: 1.057.005c yājane bhagavāñ śaktas trailokyasyāpi pārthiva 1.057.006a teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā
GE09ram_01_u:1888: 1.057.006c sa rājā punar evaitān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:1890: 1.057.007c anyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1891: 1.057.008a ṛṣiputrās tu tac chrutvā vākyaṃ ghorābhisaṃhitam
GE09ram_01_u:1893: 1.057.008e evam uktvā mahātmāno viviśus te svam āśramam
GE09ram_01_u:1894: 1.057.009a atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1897: 1.057.010a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mantriṇaḥ sarve tyaktvā caṇḍālarūpiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:1899: 1.057.011a eko hi rājā kākutstha jagāma paramātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:1901: 1.057.012a viśvāmitras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ viphalīkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:1902: 1.057.012c caṇḍālarūpiṇaṃ rāma muniḥ kāruṇyam āgataḥ 1.057.013a kāruṇyāt sa mahātejā vākyaṃ parama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1903: 1.057.013c idaṃ jagāda bhadraṃ te rājānaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1904: 1.057.014a kim āgamanakāryaṃ te rājaputra mahābala 1.057.014c ayodhyādhipate vīra śāpāc caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ 1.057.015a atha tad vākyam ākarṇya rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1905: 1.057.015c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam 1.057.016a pratyākhyāto 'smi guruṇā guruputrais tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:1906: 1.057.016c anavāpyaiva taṃ kāmaṃ mayā prāpto viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1907: 1.057.017a saśarīro divaṃ yāyām iti me saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:1908: 1.057.017c mayā ceṣṭaṃ kratuśataṃ tac ca nāvāpyate phalam
GE09ram_01_u:1909: 1.057.018a anṛtaṃ nokta pūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
GE09ram_01_u:1910: 1.057.018c kṛcchreṣv api gataḥ saumya kṣatradharmeṇa te śape
GE09ram_01_u:1911: 1.057.019a yajñair bahuvidhair iṣṭaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1912: 1.057.019c guravaś ca mahātmānaḥ śīlavṛttena toṣitāḥ 1.057.020a dharme prayatamānasya yajñaṃ cāhartum icchataḥ 1.057.020c paritoṣaṃ na gacchanti guravo munipuṃgava 1.057.021a daivam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
GE09ram_01_u:1913: 1.057.021c daivenākramyate sarvaṃ daivaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1914: 1.057.022a tasya me paramārtasya prasādam abhikāṅkṣataḥ 1.057.022c kartum arhasi bhadraṃ te daivopahatakarmaṇaḥ 1.057.023a nānyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyaḥ śaraṇam asti me
GE09ram_01_u:1916: 1.058.001a uktavākyaṃ tu rājānaṃ kṛpayā kuśikātmajaḥ 1.058.001c abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ sākṣāc caṇḍālarūpiṇam 1.058.002a ikṣvāko svāgataṃ vatsa jānāmi tvāṃ sudhārmikam
GE09ram_01_u:1917: 1.058.002c śaraṇaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīr nṛpapuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:1918: 1.058.003a aham āmantraye sarvān maharṣīn puṇyakarmaṇaḥ 1.058.003c yajñasāhyakarān rājaṃs tato yakṣyasi nirvṛtaḥ 1.058.004a guruśāpakṛtaṃ rūpaṃ yad idaṃ tvayi vartate
GE09ram_01_u:1919: 1.058.004c anena saha rūpeṇa saśarīro gamiṣyasi 1.058.005a hastaprāptam ahaṃ manye svargaṃ tava nareśvara
GE09ram_01_u:1920: 1.058.005c yas tvaṃ kauśikam āgamya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1921: 1.058.006a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ putrān paramadhārmikān 1.058.006c vyādideśa mahāprājñān
GE09ram_01_u:1922: 1.058.007a sarvāñ śiṣyān samāhūya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:1923: 1.058.008a sarvān ṛṣivarān vatsā ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā 1.058.008c saśiṣyān suhṛdaś caiva sartvijaḥ subahuśrutān 1.058.009a yad anyo vacanaṃ brūyān madvākyabalacoditaḥ 1.058.009c tat sarvam akhilenoktaṃ mamākhyeyam anādṛtam 1.058.010a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā diśo jagmus tadājñayā
GE09ram_01_u:1924: 1.058.010c ājagmur atha deśebhyaḥ sarvebhyo brahmavādinaḥ 1.058.011a te ca śiṣyāḥ samāgamya muniṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:1925: 1.058.011c ūcuś ca vacanaṃ sarve sarveṣāṃ brahmavādinām
GE09ram_01_u:1926: 1.058.012a śrutvā te vacanaṃ sarve samāyānti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1928: 1.058.013a vāsiṣṭhaṃ tac chataṃ sarvaṃ krodhaparyākulākṣaram 1.058.013c yad āha vacanaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:1929: 1.058.014a kṣatriyo yājako yasya caṇḍālasya viśeṣataḥ 1.058.014c kathaṃ sadasi bhoktāro havis tasya surarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:1930: 1.058.015a brāhmaṇā vā mahātmāno bhuktvā caṇḍālabhojanam 1.058.015c kathaṃ svargaṃ gamiṣyanti viśvāmitreṇa pālitāḥ 1.058.016a etad vacanaṃ naiṣṭhuryam ūcuḥ saṃraktalocanāḥ 1.058.016c vāsiṣṭhā muniśārdūla sarve te samahodayāḥ 1.058.017a teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ 1.058.017c krodhasaṃraktanayanaḥ saroṣam idam abravīt

GE09ram_01_u:2078: 1.062.026a uvācātmahitaṃ vākyam ahitaṃ kauśikasya ca 1.063.001a surakāryam idaṃ rambhe kartavyaṃ sumahat tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:2080: 1.063.002a tathoktā sāpsarā rāma sahasrākṣeṇa dhīmatā 1.063.002c vrīḍitā prāñjalir bhūtvā pratyuvāca sureśvaram 1.063.003a ayaṃ surapate ghoro viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.063.003c krodham utsrakṣyate ghoraṃ mayi deva na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2081: 1.063.003e tato hi me bhayaṃ deva prasādaṃ kartum arhasi 1.063.004a tām uvāca sahasrākṣo vepamānāṃ kṛtāñjalim 1.063.004c mā bhaiṣi rambhe bhadraṃ te kuruṣva mama śāsanam 1.063.005a kokilo hṛdayagrāhī mādhave ruciradrume
GE09ram_01_u:2082: 1.063.005c ahaṃ kandarpasahitaḥ sthāsyāmi tava pārśvataḥ 1.063.006a tvaṃ hi rūpaṃ bahuguṇaṃ kṛtvā paramabhāsvaram
GE09ram_01_u:2083: 1.063.006c tam ṛṣiṃ kauśikaṃ rambhe bhedayasva tapasvinam
GE09ram_01_u:2084: 1.063.007a sā śrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā rūpam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2085: 1.063.007c lobhayām āsa lalitā viśvāmitraṃ śucismitā 1.063.008a kokilasya tu śuśrāva valgu vyāharataḥ svanam
GE09ram_01_u:2086: 1.063.008c saṃprahṛṣṭena manasā tata enām udaikṣata 1.063.009a atha tasya ca śabdena gītenāpratimena
GE09ram_01_u:2087: 1.063.009c darśanena ca rambhāyā muniḥ saṃdeham āgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2088: 1.063.010a sahasrākṣasya tat karma vijñāya munipuṃgavaḥ 1.063.010c rambhāṃ krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ śaśāpa kuśikātmajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2089: 1.063.011a yan māṃ lobhayase rambhe kāmakrodhajayaiṣiṇam 1.063.011c daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śailī sthāsyasi durbhage
GE09ram_01_u:2092: 1.063.013a evam uktvā mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.063.013c aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ kopaṃ saṃtāpam āgataḥ 1.063.014a tasya śāpena mahatā rambhā śailī tadābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:2093: 1.063.014c vacaḥ śrutvā ca kandarpo maharṣeḥ sa ca nirgataḥ 1.063.015a kopena sa mahātejās tapo 'paharaṇe kṛte
GE09ram_01_u:2094: 1.063.015c indriyair ajitai rāma na lebhe śāntim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2095: 1.064.001a atha haimavatīṃ rāma diśaṃ tyaktvā mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2096: 1.064.001c pūrvāṃ diśam anuprāpya tapas tepe sudāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2097: 1.064.002a maunaṃ varṣasahasrasya kṛtvā vratam anuttamam 1.064.002c cakārāpratimaṃ rāma tapaḥ paramaduṣkaram
GE09ram_01_u:2098: 1.064.003a pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu kāṣṭhabhūtaṃ mahāmunim 1.064.003c vighnair bahubhir ādhūtaṃ krodho nāntaram āviśat
GE09ram_01_u:2100: 1.064.004c mohitās tejasā tasya tapasā mandaraśmayaḥ 1.064.004e kaśmalopahatāḥ sarve pitāmaham
GE09ram_01_u:2101: 1.064.005a bahubhiḥ kāraṇair deva viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.064.005c lobhitaḥ krodhitaś caiva tapasā cābhivardhate 1.064.006a na hy asya vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dṛśyate sūkṣmam apy atha
GE09ram_01_u:2102: 1.064.006c na dīyate yadi tv asya manasā yad abhīpsitam 1.064.006e vināśayati trailokyaṃ tapasā sacarācaram
GE09ram_01_u:2103: 1.064.006g vyākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā na ca kiṃ cit prakāśate
GE09ram_01_u:2104: 1.064.007a sāgarāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve viśīryante ca parvatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2105: 1.064.007c prakampate ca pṛthivī vāyur vāti bhṛśākulaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2106: 1.064.008a buddhiṃ na kurute yāvan nāśe deva mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2107: 1.064.008c tāvat prasādyo bhagavān agnirūpo mahādyutiḥ 1.064.009a kālāgninā yathā pūrvaṃ trailokyaṃ dahyate 'khilam
GE09ram_01_u:2108: 1.064.009c devarājye cikīrṣeta dīyatām asya yan matam
GE09ram_01_u:2110: 1.064.010c viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ vākyaṃ madhuram abruvan 1.064.011a brahmarṣe svāgataṃ te 'stu tapasā sma sutoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2111: 1.064.011c brāhmaṇyaṃ tapasogreṇa prāptavān asi kauśika 1.064.012a dīrgham āyuś ca te brahman dadāmi samarudgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2112: 1.064.012c svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gaccha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_01_u:2113: 1.064.013a pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ ca divaukasām 1.064.013c kṛtvā praṇāmaṃ mudito vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ 1.064.014a brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi me prāptaṃ dīrgham āyus tathaiva ca 1.064.014c oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāro vedāś ca varayantu mām 1.064.015a kṣatravedavidāṃ śreṣṭho brahmavedavidām api
GE09ram_01_u:2114: 1.064.015c brahmaputro vasiṣṭho mām evaṃ vadatu devatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2115: 1.064.015e yady ayaṃ paramaḥ kāmaḥ kṛto yāntu surarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2116: 1.064.016a tataḥ prasādito devair vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2117: 1.064.016c sakhyaṃ cakāra brahmarṣir evam astv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2118: 1.064.017a brahmarṣitvaṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvaṃ saṃpatsyate tava
GE09ram_01_u:2119: 1.064.017c ity uktvā devatāś cāpi sarvā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:2121: 1.064.018c pūjayām āsa brahmarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_01_u:2122: 1.064.019a kṛtakāmo mahīṃ sarvāṃ cacāra tapasi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2123: 1.064.019c evaṃ tv anena brāhmaṇyaṃ prāptaṃ rāma mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:2124: 1.064.020a eṣa rāma muniśreṣṭha eṣa vigrahavāṃs tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2125: 1.064.020c eṣa dharmaḥ paro nityaṃ vīryasyaiṣa parāyaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2127: 1.064.021c janakaḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca kuśikātmajam 1.064.022a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:2128: 1.064.022c yajñaṃ kākutstha sahitaḥ prāptavān asi dhārmika
GE09ram_01_u:2130: 1.064.023c guṇā bahuvidhāḥ prāptās tava saṃdarśanān mayā
GE09ram_01_u:2131: 1.064.024a vistareṇa ca te brahman kīrtyamānaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2132: 1.064.024c śrutaṃ mayā mahātejo rāmeṇa ca mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:2133: 1.064.025a sadasyaiḥ prāpya ca sadaḥ śrutās te bahavo guṇāḥ 1.064.026a aprameyaṃ tapas tubhyam aprameyaṃ ca te balam
GE09ram_01_u:2134: 1.064.026c aprameyā guṇāś caiva nityaṃ te kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:2135: 1.064.027a tṛptir āścaryabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ nāsti me vibho
GE09ram_01_u:2137: 1.064.028a śvaḥ prabhāte mahātejo draṣṭum arhasi māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2138: 1.064.028c svāgataṃ tapasāṃ śreṣṭha mām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:2139: 1.064.029a evam uktvā muniśreṣṭhaṃ vaideho mithilādhipaḥ 1.064.029c pradakṣiṇaṃ cakārāśu sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2141: 1.064.030c svaṃ vāṭam abhicakrāma pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ 1.065.001a tataḥ prabhāte vimale kṛtakarmā narādhipaḥ 1.065.001c viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānam ājuhāva sarāghavam
GE09ram_01_u:2142: 1.065.002a tam arcayitvā dharmātmā śāstradṛṣṭtena karmaṇā 1.065.002c rāghavau ca mahātmānau tadā vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:2143: 1.065.003a bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kiṃ karomi tavānagha
GE09ram_01_u:2144: 1.065.003c bhavān ājñāpayatu mām ājñāpyo bhavatā hy aham
GE09ram_01_u:2145: 1.065.004a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā janakena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:2146: 1.065.004c pratyuvāca munir vīraṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 1.065.005a putrau daśarathasyemau kṣatriyau lokaviśrutau
GE09ram_01_u:2147: 1.065.005c draṣṭukāmau dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yad etat tvayi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_01_u:2148: 1.065.006a etad darśaya bhadraṃ te kṛtakāmau nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:2149: 1.065.006c darśanād asya dhanuṣo yatheṣṭaṃ pratiyāsyataḥ 1.065.007a evam uktas tu janakaḥ pratyuvāca mahāmunim
GE09ram_01_u:2150: 1.065.007c śrūyatām asya dhanuṣo yad artham iha tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_01_u:2151: 1.065.008a devarāta iti khyāto nimeḥ ṣaṣṭho mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2152: 1.065.008c nyāso 'yaṃ tasya bhagavan haste datto mahātmanā 1.065.009a dakṣayajñavadhe pūrvaṃ dhanur āyamya vīryavān 1.065.009c rudras tu tridaśān roṣāt salilam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2153: 1.065.010a yasmād bhāgārthino bhāgān nākalpayata me surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2154: 1.065.010c varāṅgāni mahārhāṇi dhanuṣā śātayāmi vaḥ 1.065.011a tato vimanasaḥ sarve devā vai munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:2156: 1.065.012a prītiyuktaḥ sa sarveṣāṃ dadau teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:2157: 1.065.013a tad etad devadevasya dhanūratnaṃ mahātmanaḥ 1.065.013c nyāsabhūtaṃ tadā nyastam asmākaṃ pūrvake vibho
GE09ram_01_u:2158: 1.065.014a atha me kṛṣataḥ kṣetraṃ lāṅgalād utthitā mama
GE09ram_01_u:2159: 1.065.014c kṣetraṃ śodhayatā labdhvā nāmnā sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_01_u:2160: 1.065.015a bhūtalād utthitā sā tu vyavardhata mamātmajā
GE09ram_01_u:2161: 1.065.015c vīryaśulketi me kanyā sthāpiteyam ayonijā 1.065.016a bhūtalād utthitāṃ tāṃ tu vardhamānāṃ mamātmajām
GE09ram_01_u:2162: 1.065.016c varayām āsur āgamya rājāno munipuṃgava 1.065.017a teṣāṃ varayatāṃ kanyāṃ sarveṣāṃ pṛthivīkṣitām 1.065.017c vīryaśulketi bhagavan na dadāmi sutām aham
GE09ram_01_u:2163: 1.065.018a tataḥ sarve nṛpatayaḥ sametya munipuṃgava 1.065.018c mithilām abhyupāgamya vīryaṃ jijñāsavas tadā 1.065.019a teṣāṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ vīryaṃ dhanur upāhṛtam 1.065.019c na śekur grahaṇe tasya dhanuṣas tolane 'pi vā
GE09ram_01_u:2164: 1.065.020a teṣāṃ vīryavatāṃ vīryam alpaṃ jñātvā mahāmune
GE09ram_01_u:2165: 1.065.020c pratyākhyātā nṛpatayas tan nibodha tapodhana 1.065.021a tataḥ paramakopena rājāno
GE09ram_01_u:2166: 1.065.021c arundhan mithilāṃ sarve vīryasaṃdeham āgatāḥ 1.065.022a ātmānam avadhūtaṃ te vijñāya munipuṃgava 1.065.022c roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭāḥ pīḍayan mithilāṃ purīm 1.065.023a tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe kṣayaṃ yātāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2168: 1.065.024a tato devagaṇān sarvāṃs tapasāhaṃ prasādayam 1.065.024c daduś ca paramaprītāś caturaṅgabalaṃ surāḥ 1.065.025a tato bhagnā nṛpatayo hanyamānā diśo yayuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2170: 1.065.026a tad etan muniśārdūla dhanuḥ paramabhāsvaram 1.065.026c rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi darśayiṣyāmi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:2171: 1.065.027a yady asya dhanuṣo rāmaḥ kuryād āropaṇaṃ mune
GE09ram_01_u:2172: 1.065.027c sutām ayonijāṃ sītāṃ dadyāṃ dāśarather aham
GE09ram_01_u:2173: 1.066.001a janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.066.001c dhanur darśaya rāmāya iti hovāca pārthivam
GE09ram_01_u:2174: 1.066.002a tataḥ sa rājā janakaḥ sacivān vyādideśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:2176: 1.066.003a janakena samādiṣṭhāḥ sacivāḥ prāviśan purīm 1.066.003c tad dhanuḥ purataḥ kṛtvā nirjagmuḥ pārthivājñayā
GE09ram_01_u:2177: 1.066.004a nṛpāṃ śatāni pañcāśad vyāyatānāṃ mahātmanām 1.066.004c mañjūṣām aṣṭacakrāṃ tāṃ samūhas te kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:2178: 1.066.005a tām ādāya tu mañjūṣām āyatīṃ yatra tad dhanuḥ 1.066.005c suropamaṃ te janakam ūcur nṛpati mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2179: 1.066.006a idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ rājan pūjitaṃ sarvarājabhiḥ 1.066.006c mithilādhipa rājendra darśanīyaṃ yadīcchasi
GE09ram_01_u:2180: 1.066.007a teṣāṃ nṛpo vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:2181: 1.066.007c viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ tau cobhau rāmalakṣmaṇau 1.066.008a idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ brahmañ janakair abhipūjitam 1.066.008c rājabhiś ca mahāvīryair aśakyaṃ pūrituṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2182: 1.066.009a naitat suragaṇāḥ sarve nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2183: 1.066.009c gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ 1.066.010a kva gatir mānuṣāṇāṃ ca dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_01_u:2185: 1.066.011a tad etad dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭham ānītaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:2187: 1.066.012a viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā śrutvā janakabhāṣitam 1.066.012c vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2188: 1.066.013a maharṣer vacanād rāmo yatra tiṣṭhati tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2189: 1.066.013c mañjūṣāṃ tām apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā dhanur athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2190: 1.066.014a idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ brahman saṃspṛśāmīha pāṇinā 1.066.014c yatnavāṃś ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe 'pi vā
GE09ram_01_u:2191: 1.066.015a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā muniś ca samabhāṣata 1.066.015c līlayā sa dhanur madhye jagrāha vacanān muneḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2193: 1.066.016c āropayat sa dharmātmā salīlam iva tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2194: 1.066.017a āropayitvā maurvīṃ ca pūrayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:2195: 1.066.017c tad babhañja dhanur madhye naraśreṣṭho mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2196: 1.066.018a tasya śabdo mahān āsīn nirghātasamaniḥsvanaḥ 1.066.018c bhūmikampaś ca sumahān parvatasyeva dīryataḥ 1.066.019a nipetuś ca narāḥ sarve tena śabdena mohitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2197: 1.066.019c vrajayitvā munivaraṃ rājānaṃ tau ca rāghavau
GE09ram_01_u:2198: 1.066.020a pratyāśvasto jane tasmin rājā vigatasādhvasaḥ 1.066.020c uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ vākyajño munipuṃgavam 1.066.021a bhagavan dṛṣṭavīryo me rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 1.066.021c atyadbhutam acintyaṃ ca atarkitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:2199: 1.066.022a janakānāṃ kule kīrtim āhariṣyati me sutā
GE09ram_01_u:2200: 1.066.022c sītā bhartāram āsādya rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam 1.066.023a mama satyā pratijñā ca vīryaśulketi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:2201: 1.066.023c sītā prāṇair bahumatā deyā rāmāya me sutā
GE09ram_01_u:2203: 1.066.024c mama kauśika bhadraṃ te ayodhyāṃ tvaritā rathaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2204: 1.066.025a rājānaṃ praśritair vākyair ānayantu puraṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:2205: 1.066.025c pradānaṃ vīryaśulkāḥ kathayantu ca sarvaśaḥ 1.066.026a muniguptau ca kākutsthau kathayantu nṛpāya vai
GE09ram_01_u:2206: 1.066.026c prīyamāṇaṃ tu rājānam ānayantu suśīghragāḥ 1.066.027a kauśikaś ca tathety āha rājā cābhāṣya mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2207: 1.066.027c ayodhyāṃ preṣayām āsa dharmātmā kṛtaśāsanāt 1.067.001a janakena samādiṣṭā dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ 1.067.001c trirātram uṣitvā mārge te 'yodhyāṃ prāviśan purīm 1.067.002a te rājavacanād dūtā rājaveśmapraveśitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2208: 1.067.002c dadṛśur devasaṃkāśaṃ vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam 1.067.003a baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve dūtā vigatasādhvasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2209: 1.067.003c rājānaṃ prayatā vākyam abruvan madhurākṣaram 1.067.004a maithilo janako rājā
GE09ram_01_u:2211: 1.067.005a muhur muhur madhurayā snehasaṃyuktayā girā 1.067.005c janakas tvāṃ mahārāja pṛcchate sapuraḥsaram 1.067.006a pṛṣṭvā kuśalam avyagraṃ vaideho mithilādhipaḥ 1.067.006c kauśikānumate vākyaṃ bhavantam idam abravīt 1.067.007a pūrvaṃ pratijñā viditā vīryaśulkā mamātmajā 1.067.007c rājānaś ca kṛtāmarṣā nirvīryā vimukhīkṛtāḥ 1.067.008a seyaṃ mama sutā rājan viśvāmitra puraḥsaraiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2212: 1.067.008c yadṛcchayāgatair vīrair nirjitā tava putrakaiḥ 1.067.009a tac ca rājan dhanur divyaṃ madhye bhagnaṃ mahātmanā 1.067.009c rāmeṇa hi mahārāja mahatyāṃ janasaṃsadi 1.067.010a asmai deyā mayā sītā vīryaśulkā mahātmane
GE09ram_01_u:2213: 1.067.010c pratijñāṃ tartum icchāmi tad anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:2215: 1.067.011c śīghram āgaccha bhadraṃ te draṣṭum arhasi rāghavau
GE09ram_01_u:2216: 1.067.012a prītiṃ ca mama rājendra nirvartayitum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:2217: 1.067.012c putrayor ubhayor eva prītiṃ tvam api lapsyase
GE09ram_01_u:2218: 1.067.013a evaṃ videhādhipatir madhuraṃ vākyam abravīt 1.067.013c viśvāmitrābhyanujñātaḥ śatānandamate sthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2219: 1.067.014a dūtavākyaṃ tu tac chrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2220: 1.067.014c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca mantriṇo 'nyāṃś ca so 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2222: 1.067.015c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā videheṣu vasaty asau
GE09ram_01_u:2223: 1.067.016a dṛṣṭavīryas tu kākutstho janakena mahātmanā 1.067.016c saṃpradānaṃ sutāyās tu rāghave kartum icchati
GE09ram_01_u:2224: 1.067.017a yadi vo rocate vṛttaṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2225: 1.067.017c purīṃ gacchāmahe śīghraṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2226: 1.067.018a mantriṇo bāḍham ity āhuḥ saha sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2227: 1.067.018c suprītaś cābravīd rājā śvo yātreti sa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2228: 1.067.019a mantriṇas tu narendrasya rātriṃ paramasatkṛtāḥ 1.067.019c ūṣuḥ pramuditāḥ sarve guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2229: 1.068.001a tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ 1.068.001c rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ sumantram idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2230: 1.068.002a adya sarve dhanādhyakṣā dhanam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_01_u:2232: 1.068.003a caturaṅgabalaṃ cāpi śīghraṃ niryātu sarvaśaḥ 1.068.003c mamājñāsamakālaṃ ca yānayugyam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2233: 1.068.004a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2234: 1.068.004c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur ṛṣiḥ kātyāyanas tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2235: 1.068.005a ete dvijāḥ prayāntv agre syandanaṃ yojayasva me
GE09ram_01_u:2236: 1.068.005c yathā kālātyayo na syād dūtā hi tvarayanti mām 1.068.006a vacanāc ca narendrasya sā senā caturaṅgiṇī
GE09ram_01_u:2238: 1.068.007a gatvā caturahaṃ mārgaṃ videhān abhyupeyivān 1.068.007c rājā tu janakaḥ śrīmāñ śrutvā pūjām akalpayat
GE09ram_01_u:2239: 1.068.008a tato rājānam āsādya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_01_u:2240: 1.068.008c janako mudito rājā harṣaṃ ca paramaṃ yayau
GE09ram_01_u:2241: 1.068.008e uvāca na naraśreṣṭho naraśreṣṭhaṃ mudānvitam 1.068.009a svāgataṃ te mahārāja diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:2242: 1.068.009c putrayor ubhayoḥ prītiṃ lapsyase vīryanirjitām 1.068.010a diṣṭyā prāpto mahātejā vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2243: 1.068.010c saha sarvair dvijaśreṣṭhair devair iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2244: 1.068.011a diṣṭyā me nirjitā vighnā diṣṭyā me pūjitaṃ kulam 1.068.011c rāghavaiḥ saha saṃbandhād vīryaśreṣṭhair mahātmabhiḥ 1.068.012a śvaḥ prabhāte narendrendra nirvartayitum arhasi 1.068.012c yajñasyānte naraśreṣṭha vivāham ṛṣisaṃmatam
GE09ram_01_u:2245: 1.068.013a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣimadhye narādhipaḥ 1.068.013c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim 1.068.014a pratigraho dātṛvaśaḥ śrutam etan mayā purā
GE09ram_01_u:2246: 1.068.014c yathā vakṣyasi dharmajña tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:2247: 1.068.015a tad dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2248: 1.068.015c śrutvā videhādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āgataḥ 1.068.016a tataḥ sarve munigaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2249: 1.068.016c harṣeṇa mahatā yuktās tāṃ niśām avasan sukham
GE09ram_01_u:2250: 1.068.017a rājā ca rāghavau putrau niśāmya pariharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2253: 1.068.018c yajñasya ca sutābhyāṃ ca kṛtvā rātrim uvāsa ha 1.069.001a tataḥ prabhāte janakaḥ kṛtakarmā maharṣibhiḥ 1.069.001c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ śatānandaṃ purohitam 1.069.002a bhrātā mama mahātejā yavīyān atidhārmikaḥ 1.069.002c kuśadhvaja iti khyātaḥ purīm adhyavasac chubhām
GE09ram_01_u:2255: 1.069.003c sāṃkāśyāṃ puṇyasaṃkāśāṃ vimānam iva puṣpakam 1.069.004a tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yajñagoptā sa me mataḥ 1.069.004c prītiṃ so 'pi mahātejā iṃmāṃ bhoktā mayā saha 1.069.005a śāsanāt tu narendrasya prayayuḥ śīghravājibhiḥ 1.069.005c samānetuṃ naravyāghraṃ viṣṇum indrājñayā yathā 1.069.006a ājñayā tu narendrasya ājagāma kuśadhvajaḥ 1.069.007a sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ janakaṃ dharmavatsalam 1.069.007c so 'bhivādya śatānandaṃ rājānaṃ cāpi dhārmikam
GE09ram_01_u:2256: 1.069.008a rājārhaṃ paramaṃ divyam āsanaṃ cādhyarohata 1.069.008c upaviṣṭāv ubhau tau tu bhrātarāv amitaujasau
GE09ram_01_u:2257: 1.069.009a preṣayām āsatur vīrau mantriśreṣṭhaṃ sudāmanam 1.069.009c gaccha mantripate śīghram aikṣvākam amitaprabham 1.069.009e ātmajaiḥ saha durdharṣam ānayasva samantriṇam 1.069.010a aupakāryāṃ sa gatvā tu raghūṇāṃ kulavardhanam
GE09ram_01_u:2258: 1.069.010c dadarśa śirasā cainam abhivādyedam abravīt 1.069.011a ayodhyādhipate vīra vaideho
GE09ram_01_u:2259: 1.069.011c sa tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vyavasitaḥ sopādhyāyapurohitam 1.069.012a mantriśreṣṭhavacaḥ śrutvā rājā sarṣigaṇas tadā 1.069.012c sabandhur agamat tatra janako yatra vartate
GE09ram_01_u:2260: 1.069.013a sa rājā mantrisahitaḥ sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ 1.069.013c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho vaideham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2262: 1.069.014c vaktā sarveṣu kṛtyeṣu vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2264: 1.069.015c eṣa vakṣyati dharmātmā vasiṣṭho me yathākramam
GE09ram_01_u:2265: 1.069.016a tūṣṇīṃbhūte daśarathe vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ 1.069.016c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajño vaidehaṃ sapurohitam 1.069.017a avyaktaprabhavo brahmā śāśvato nitya avyayaḥ 1.069.017c tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2266: 1.069.018a vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivaivataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2267: 1.069.018c manuḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2268: 1.069.019a tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
GE09ram_01_u:2269: 1.069.019c ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān vikukṣir udapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:2270: 1.069.020a vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:2271: 1.069.020c bāṇasya tu mahātejā anaraṇyaḥ pratāpavān 1.069.021a anaraṇyāt pṛthur jajñe triśaṅkus tu pṛthoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2272: 1.069.021c triśaṅkor abhavat putro dhundhumāro mahāyaśāḥ 1.069.022a dhundhumārān mahātejā yuvanāśvo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2274: 1.069.023a māndhātus tu sutaḥ śrīmān susaṃdhir udapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:2275: 1.069.023c susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_01_u:2276: 1.069.024a yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2277: 1.069.024c bharatāt tu mahātejā asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_01_u:2278: 1.069.025a saha tena gareṇaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:2281: 1.069.026c bhagīrathāt kakutsthaś ca kakutsthasya raghus tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2282: 1.069.027a raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2283: 1.069.027c kalmāṣapādo hy abhavat tasmāj jātas tu śaṅkhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2285: 1.069.028c śīghragas tv agnivarṇasya śīghragasya maruḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2286: 1.069.029a maroḥ praśuśrukas tv āsīd ambarīṣaḥ praśuśrukāt
GE09ram_01_u:2287: 1.069.029c ambarīṣasya putro 'bhūn nahuṣaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 1.069.030a nahuṣasya yayātis tu nābhāgas tu yayātijaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2289: 1.069.030e tasmād daśarathāj jātau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 1.069.031a ādivaṃśaviśuddhānāṃ rājñāṃ paramadharmiṇām
GE09ram_01_u:2291: 1.069.032a rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe tvatsute varaye nṛpa 1.069.032c sadṛśābhyāṃ naraśreṣṭha sadṛśe dātum arhasi 1.070.001a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ janakaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ 1.070.001c śrotum arhasi bhadraṃ te kulaṃ naḥ kīrtitaṃ param 1.070.002a pradāne hi muniśreṣṭha kulaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ 1.070.002c vaktavyaṃ kulajātena tan nibodha mahāmune 1.070.003a rājābhūt triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:2293: 1.070.004a tasya putro mithir nāma janako mithi putrakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2294: 1.070.004c prathamo janako nāma janakād apy udāvasuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2295: 1.070.005a udāvasos tu dharmātmā jāto vai nandivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2296: 1.070.005c nandivardhana putras tu suketur nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2297: 1.070.006a suketor api dharmātmā devarāto mahābalaḥ 1.070.006c devarātasya rājarṣer bṛhadratha iti śrutaḥ 1.070.007a bṛhadrathasya śūro 'bhūn mahāvīraḥ pratāpavān 1.070.007c mahāvīrasya dhṛtimān sudhṛtiḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2298: 1.070.008a sudhṛter api dharmātmā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sudhārmikaḥ 1.070.008c dhṛṣṭaketos tu rājarṣer haryaśva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2299: 1.070.009a haryaśvasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ pratīndhakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2300: 1.070.009c pratīndhakasya dharmātmā rājā kīrtirathaḥ sutaḥ 1.070.010a putraḥ kīrtirathasyāpi devamīḍha iti smṛtaḥ 1.070.010c devamīḍhasya vibudho vibudhasya mahīdhrakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2303: 1.070.012a mahāroṃṇas tu dharmātmā svarṇaromā vyajāyata 1.070.012c svarṇaroṃṇas tu rājarṣer hrasvaromā vyajāyata 1.070.013a tasya putradvayaṃ jajñe dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ 1.070.013c jyeṣṭho 'ham anujo bhrātā mama vīraḥ kuśadhvajaḥ 1.070.014a māṃ tu jyeṣṭhaṃ pitā rājye so 'bhiṣicya narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2304: 1.070.014c kuśadhvajaṃ samāveśya bhāraṃ mayi vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2305: 1.070.015a vṛddhe pitari svaryāte dharmeṇa dhuram āvaham
GE09ram_01_u:2306: 1.070.015c bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ snehāt paśyan kuśadhvajam 1.070.016a kasya cit tv atha kālasya sāṃkāśyād agamat purāt 1.070.016c sudhanvā vīryavān rājā mithilām avarodhakaḥ 1.070.017a sa ca me preṣayām āsa śaivaṃ dhanur anuttamam 1.070.017c sītā kanyā ca padmākṣī mahyaṃ vai dīyatām iti 1.070.018a tasyāpradānād brahmarṣe yuddham āsīn mayā saha
GE09ram_01_u:2307: 1.070.018c sa hato 'bhimukho rājā sudhanvā tu mayā raṇe 1.070.019a nihatya taṃ muniśreṣṭha sudhanvānaṃ narādhipam 1.070.019c sāṃkāśye bhrātaraṃ śūram abhyaṣiñcaṃ kuśadhvajam 1.070.020a kanīyān eṣa me bhrātā ahaṃ jyeṣṭho mahāmune
GE09ram_01_u:2308: 1.070.020c dadāmi paramaprīto vadhvau te munipuṃgava 1.070.021a sītāṃ rāmāya bhadraṃ te ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca
GE09ram_01_u:2309: 1.070.021c vīryaśulkāṃ mama sutāṃ sītāṃ surasutopamām 1.070.022a dvitīyām ūrmilāṃ caiva trir vadāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2310: 1.070.022c dadāmi paramaprīto vadhvau te raghunandana 1.070.023a rāmalakṣmaṇayo rājan godānaṃ kārayasva ha 1.070.023c pitṛkāryaṃ ca bhadraṃ te tato vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_01_u:2311: 1.070.024a maghā hy adya mahābāho tṛtīye divase prabho
GE09ram_01_u:2312: 1.070.024c phalgunyām uttare rājaṃs tasmin vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_01_u:2313: 1.070.024e rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe dānaṃ kāryaṃ sukhodayam 1.071.001a tam uktavantaṃ vaidehaṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.071.001c uvāca vacanaṃ vīraṃ vasiṣṭhasahito nṛpam 1.071.002a acintyāny aprameyāni kulāni narapuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:2314: 1.071.002c ikṣvākūṇāṃ videhānāṃ naiṣāṃ tulyo 'sti kaś cana 1.071.003a sadṛśo dharmasaṃbandhaḥ sadṛśo rūpasaṃpadā
GE09ram_01_u:2315: 1.071.003c rāmalakṣmaṇayo rājan sītā cormilayā saha 1.071.004a vaktavyaṃ na naraśreṣṭha śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:2316: 1.071.005a bhrātā yavīyān dharmajña eṣa rājā kuśadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2317: 1.071.005c asya dharmātmano rājan rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi 1.071.005e sutā dvayaṃ naraśreṣṭha patnyarthaṃ varayāmahe 1.071.006a bharatasya kumārasya śatrughnasya ca dhīmataḥ 1.071.006c varayema sute rājaṃs tayor arthe mahātmanoḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2322: 1.071.009a viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā vasiṣṭhasya mate tadā 1.071.009c janakaḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca munipuṃgavau 1.071.010a sadṛśaṃ kulasaṃbandhaṃ yad ājñāpayathaḥ svayam 1.071.010c evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kuśadhvajasute ime
GE09ram_01_u:2323: 1.071.010e patnyau bhajetāṃ sahitau śatrughnabharatāv ubhau 1.071.011a ekāhnā rājaputrīṇāṃ catasḥṇāṃ mahāmune
GE09ram_01_u:2324: 1.071.011c pāṇīn gṛhṇantu catvāro rājaputrā mahābalāḥ 1.071.012a uttare divase brahman phalgunībhyāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ 1.071.012c vaivāhikaṃ praśaṃsanti bhago yatra prajāpatiḥ 1.071.013a evam uktvā vacaḥ saumyaṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2325: 1.071.013c ubhau munivarau rājā janako vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2326: 1.071.014a paro dharmaḥ kṛto mahyaṃ śiṣyo 'smi bhavatoḥ sadā 1.071.014c imāny āsanamukhyāni āsetāṃ munipuṃgavau
GE09ram_01_u:2327: 1.071.015a yathā daśarathasyeyaṃ tathāyodhyā purī mama 1.071.015c prabhutve nāsit saṃdeho yathārhaṃ kartum arhathaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2328: 1.071.016a tathā bruvati vaidehe janake raghunandanaḥ 1.071.016c rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim 1.071.017a yuvām asaṃkhyeya guṇau bhrātarau mithileśvarau 1.071.017c ṛṣayo rājasaṃghāś ca bhavadbhyām abhipūjitāḥ 1.071.018a svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
GE09ram_01_u:2329: 1.071.018c śrāddhakarmāṇi sarvāṇi vidhāsya iti cābravīt 1.071.019a tam āpṛṣṭvā narapatiṃ rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2330: 1.071.019c munīndrau tau puraskṛtya jagāmāśu mahāyaśāḥ 1.071.020a sa gatvā nilayaṃ rājā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2331: 1.071.020c prabhāte kālyam utthāya cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2333: 1.071.021c ekaikaśo dadau rājā putrān uddhiśya dharmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2336: 1.071.023a vittam anyac ca subahu dvijebhyo raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2337: 1.071.023c dadau godānam uddiśya putrāṇāṃ putravatsalaḥ 1.071.024a sa sutaiḥ kṛtagodānair vṛtaś ca nṛpatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2338: 1.071.024c lokapālair ivābhāti vṛtaḥ saumyaḥ prajāpatiḥ 1.072.001a yasmiṃs tu divase rājā cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2339: 1.072.001c tasmiṃs tu divase śūro yudhājit samupeyivān
GE09ram_01_u:2341: 1.072.002c dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2342: 1.072.003a kekayādhipatī rājā snehāt kuśalam abravīt 1.072.003c yeṣāṃ kuśalakāmo 'si teṣāṃ saṃpraty anāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:2343: 1.072.004a svasrīyaṃ mama rājendra draṣṭukāmo mahīpate 1.072.004c tadartham upayāto 'ham ayodhyāṃ raghunandana 1.072.005a śrutvā tv ahaym ayodhyāyāṃ vivāhārthaṃ tāv ātmajān
GE09ram_01_u:2344: 1.072.005c mithilām upayātās tu tvayā saha mahīpate
GE09ram_01_u:2346: 1.072.006c atha rājā daśarathaḥ priyātithim upasthima 1.072.007a dṛṣṭvā paramasatkāraiḥ pūjārhaṃ samapūjayat
GE09ram_01_u:2347: 1.072.007c tatas tām uṣito rātriṃ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2348: 1.072.008a ṛṣīṃs tadā puraskṛtya yajñavāṭam upāgamat 1.072.008c yukte muhūrte vijaye sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2350: 1.072.009a vasiṣṭhaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīn aparān api
GE09ram_01_u:2354: 1.072.011c svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva kṛtvā vaivāhyam uttamam 1.072.012a ity uktaḥ paramodāro vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā 1.072.012c pratyuvāca mahātejā vākyaṃ paramadharmavit
GE09ram_01_u:2355: 1.072.013a kaḥ sthitaḥ pratihāro me kasyājñā saṃpratīkṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:2356: 1.072.013c svagṛhe ko vicāro 'sti yathā rājyam idaṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:2358: 1.072.014c mama kanyā muniśreṣṭha dīptā vahner ivārciṣaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2360: 1.072.015c avighnaṃ kurutāṃ rājā kimarthaṃ hi vilambyate
GE09ram_01_u:2361: 1.072.016a tadvākyaṃ janakenoktaṃ śrutvā daśarathas tadā 1.072.016c praveśayām āsa sutān sarvān ṛṣigaṇān api
GE09ram_01_u:2363: 1.072.017c iyaṃ sītā mama sutā sahadharmacarī tava
GE09ram_01_u:2364: 1.072.017e pratīccha caināṃ bhadraṃ te pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā
GE09ram_01_u:2365: 1.072.018a lakṣmaṇāgaccha bhadraṃ te ūrmilām udyatāṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:2366: 1.072.018c pratīccha pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2367: 1.072.019a tam evam uktvā janako bharataṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:2368: 1.072.019c gṛhāṇa pāṇiṃ māṇḍavyāḥ pāṇinā raghunandana 1.072.020a śatrughnaṃ cāpi dharmātmā abravīj janakeśvaraḥ 1.072.020c śrutakīrtyā mahābāho pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā 1.072.021a sarve bhavantaḥ saṃyāś ca sarve sucaritavratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2369: 1.072.021c patnībhiḥ santu kākutsthā mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2370: 1.072.022a janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā pāṇīn pāṇibhir aspṛśan
GE09ram_01_u:2371: 1.072.022c catvāras te catasṛṇāṃ vasiṣṭhasya mate sthitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2372: 1.072.023a agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ rājānam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:2373: 1.072.023c ṛṣīṃś caiva mahātmānaḥ saha bhāryā raghūttamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2374: 1.072.023e yathoktena tathā cakrur vivāhaṃ vidhipūrvakam 1.072.024a puṣpavṛṣṭir mahaty āsīd antarikṣāt subhāsvarā 1.072.024c divyadundubhinirghoṣair gītavāditranisvanaiḥ 1.072.025a nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghā gandharvāś ca jaguḥ kalam
GE09ram_01_u:2375: 1.072.025c vivāhe raghumukhyānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat 1.072.026a īdṛśe vartamāne tu tūryodghuṣṭaninādite
GE09ram_01_u:2376: 1.072.026c trir agniṃ te parikramya ūhur bhāryā mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2377: 1.072.027a athopakāryāṃ jagmus te sadārā raghunandanaḥ 1.072.027c rājāpy anuyayau paśyan sarṣisaṃghaḥ sabāndhavaḥ 1.073.001a atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.073.001c āpṛcchya tau ca rājānau jagāmottaraparvatam 1.073.002a viśvāmitro gate rājā vaidehaṃ mithilādhipam 1.073.002c āpṛcchyātha jagāmāśu rājā daśarathaḥ purīm 1.073.003a atha rājā videhānāṃ dadau kanyādhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_01_u:2379: 1.073.004a kambalānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ kṣaumakoṭyambarāṇi ca 1.073.004c hastyaśvarathapādātaṃ divyarūpaṃ svalaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:2380: 1.073.005a dadau kanyā pitā tāsāṃ dāsīdāsam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2381: 1.073.005c hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya muktānāṃ vidrumasya ca 1.073.006a dadau paramasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ kanyādhanam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2382: 1.073.006c dattvā bahudhanaṃ rājā samanujñāpya pārthivam 1.073.007a praviveśa svanilayaṃ mithilāṃ mithileśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2383: 1.073.007c rājāpy ayodhyādhipatiḥ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ 1.073.008a ṛṣīn sarvān puraskṛtya jagāma sabalānugaḥ 1.073.008c gacchantaṃ tu naravyāghraṃ sarṣisaṃghaṃ sarāghavam 1.073.009a ghorāḥ sma pakṣiṇo vāco vyāharanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2384: 1.073.009c bhaumāś caiva mṛgāḥ sarve gacchanti sma pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2385: 1.073.010a tān dṛṣṭvā rājaśārdūlo vasiṣṭhaṃ paryapṛcchata 1.073.010c asaumyāḥ pakṣiṇo ghorā mṛgāś cāpi pradakṣiṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2386: 1.073.010e kim idaṃ hṛdayotkampi mano mama viṣīdati
GE09ram_01_u:2387: 1.073.011a rājño daśarathasyaitac chrutvā vākyaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2388: 1.073.011c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śrūyatām asya yat phalam
GE09ram_01_u:2389: 1.073.012a upasthitaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ divyaṃ pakṣimukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_01_u:2390: 1.073.012c mṛgāḥ praśamayanty ete saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_01_u:2391: 1.073.013a teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra vāyuḥ prādur babhūva ha
GE09ram_01_u:2392: 1.073.013c kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ pātayaṃś ca drumāṃḥ śubhān
GE09ram_01_u:2393: 1.073.014a tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ sarvā na prababhur diśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2394: 1.073.014c bhasmanā cāvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmūḍham iva tad balam
GE09ram_01_u:2395: 1.073.015a vasiṣṭha ṛṣayaś cānye rājā ca sasutas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2396: 1.073.015c sasaṃjñā iva tatrāsan sarvam anyad vicetanam
GE09ram_01_u:2397: 1.073.016a tasmiṃs tamasi ghore tu bhasmacchanneva sā camūḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2399: 1.073.017a kailāsam iva durdharṣaṃ kālāgnim iva duḥsaham
GE09ram_01_u:2400: 1.073.017c jvalantam iva tejobhir durnirīkṣyaṃ pṛthagjanaiḥ 1.073.018a skandhe cāsajya paraśuṃ dhanur vidyudgaṇopamam 1.073.018c pragṛhya śaramukhyaṃ ca tripuraghnaṃ yathā haram
GE09ram_01_u:2401: 1.073.019a taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_01_u:2403: 1.073.019e saṃgatā munayaḥ sarve saṃjajalpur atho mithaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2405: 1.073.020c pūrvaṃ kṣatravadhaṃ kṛtvā gatamanyur gatajvaraḥ 1.073.020e kṣatrasyotsādanaṃ bhūyo na khalv asya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:2406: 1.073.021a evam uktvārghyam ādāya bhārgavaṃ bhīmadarśanam 1.073.021c ṛṣayo rāma rāmeti madhurāṃ vācam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:2407: 1.073.022a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjām ṛṣidattāṃ pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:2409: 1.074.001a rāma dāśarathe vīra vīryaṃ te śrūyate 'dhutam
GE09ram_01_u:2410: 1.074.001c dhanuṣo bhedanaṃ caiva nikhilena mayā śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:2411: 1.074.002a tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca bhedanaṃ dhanuṣas tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:2412: 1.074.002c tac chrutvāham anuprāpto dhanur gṛhyāparaṃ śubham
GE09ram_01_u:2413: 1.074.003a tad idaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2414: 1.074.003c pūrayasva śareṇaiva svabalaṃ darśayasva ca 1.074.004a tad ahaṃ te balaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_01_u:2415: 1.074.004c dvandvayuddhaṃ pradāsyāmi vīryaślāghyam idaṃ tava 1.074.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarataḥs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2416: 1.074.005c viṣaṇṇavadano dīnaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt 1.074.006a kṣatraroṣāt praśāntas tvaṃ brāhmaṇasya mahāyaśāḥ 1.074.006c bālānāṃ mama putrāṇām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:2418: 1.074.007c sahasrākṣe pratijñāya śastraṃ nikṣiptavān asi 1.074.008a sa tvaṃ dharmaparo bhūtvā kāśyapāya vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_01_u:2420: 1.074.009a mama sarvavināśāya saṃprāptas tvaṃ mahāmune 1.074.009c na caikasmin hate rāme sarve jīvāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:2421: 1.074.010a bruvaty evaṃ daśarathe jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān 1.074.010c anādṛtyaiva tad vākyaṃ rāmam evābhyabhāṣata 1.074.011a ime dve dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe divye lokābhiviśrute
GE09ram_01_u:2422: 1.074.011c dṛḍhe balavatī mukhye sukṛte viśvakarmaṇā 1.074.012a atisṛṣṭaṃ surair ekaṃ tryambakāya yuyutsave 1.074.012c tripuraghnaṃ naraśreṣṭha bhagnaṃ kākutsha yat tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:2423: 1.074.013a idaṃ dvitīyaṃ durdharṣaṃ viṣṇor dattaṃ surottamaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2424: 1.074.013c samānasāraṃ kākutstha raudreṇa dhanuṣā tv idam
GE09ram_01_u:2425: 1.074.014a tadā tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitāmaham
GE09ram_01_u:2427: 1.074.015a abhiprāyaṃ tu vijñāya devatānāṃ pitāmahaḥ 1.074.015c virodhaṃ janayām āsa tayoḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2428: 1.074.016a virodhe ca mahad yuddham abhavad romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2430: 1.074.017a tadā taj jṛmbhitaṃ śaivaṃ dhanur bhīmaparākramam
GE09ram_01_u:2432: 1.074.018a devais tadā samāgamya sarṣisaṃghaiḥ sacāraṇaiḥ 1.074.018c yācitau praśamaṃ tatra jagmatus tau surottamau
GE09ram_01_u:2433: 1.074.019a jṛmbhitaṃ tad dhanur dṛṣṭvā śaivaṃ viṣṇuparākramaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2434: 1.074.019c adhikaṃ menire viṣṇuṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2435: 1.074.020a dhanū rudras tu saṃkruddho videheṣu mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2436: 1.074.020c devarātasya rājarṣer dadau haste sasāyakam 1.074.021a idaṃ ca viṣṇavaṃ rāma dhanuḥ parapuraṃjayam
GE09ram_01_u:2437: 1.074.021c ṛcīke bhārgave prādād viṣṇuḥ sa nyāsam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2439: 1.074.022c pitur mama dadau divyaṃ jamadagner mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2441: 1.074.023c arjuno vidadhe mṛtyuṃ prākṛtāṃ buddhim āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2442: 1.074.024a vadham apratirūpaṃ tu pituḥ śrutvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:2443: 1.074.024c kṣatram utsādayaṃ roṣāj jātaṃ jātam anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2444: 1.074.025a pṛthivīṃ cākhilāṃ prāpya kāśyapāya mahātmane 1.074.025c yajñasyānte tadā rāma dakṣiṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇe 1.074.026a dattvā mahendranilayas tapobalasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2445: 1.074.026c śrutavān dhanuṣo bhedaṃ tato 'haṃ drutam āgataḥ 1.074.027a tad idaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ rāma pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:2447: 1.074.028a yojayasva dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe śaraṃ parapuraṃjayam 1.074.028c yadi śaknoṣi kākutstha dvandvaṃ dāsyāmi te tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2448: 1.075.001a śrutvā taj jāmadagnyasya vākyaṃ dāśarathis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:2449: 1.075.001c gauravād yantritakathaḥ pitū rāmam athābravīt 1.075.002a śrutavān asmi yat karma kṛtavān asi bhārgava
GE09ram_01_u:2450: 1.075.002c anurundhyāmahe brahman pitur ānṛṇyam āsthitaḥ 1.075.003a vīryahīnam ivāśaktaṃ kṣatradharmeṇa bhārgava
GE09ram_01_u:2451: 1.075.003c avajānāmi me tejaḥ paśya me 'dya parākramam
GE09ram_01_u:2452: 1.075.004a ity uktvā rāghavaḥ kruddho bhārgavasya varāyudham
GE09ram_01_u:2453: 1.075.004c śaraṃ ca pratisaṃgṛhya hastāl laghuparākramaḥ 1.075.005a āropya sa dhanū rāmaḥ śaraṃ sajyaṃ cakāra ha 1.075.005c jāmadagnyaṃ tato rāmaṃ rāmaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2455: 1.075.006c tasmāc chakto na te rāma moktuṃ prāṇaharaṃ śaram 1.075.007a imāṃ vā tvadgatiṃ rāma tapobalasamārjitān 1.075.007c lokān apratimān vāpi haniṣyāmi yad icchasi
GE09ram_01_u:2456: 1.075.008a na hy ayaṃ vaiṣṇavo divyaḥ śaraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2458: 1.075.009a varāyudhadharaṃ rāma draṣṭuṃ sarṣigaṇāḥ surāḥ 1.075.009c pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya sametās tatra saṃghaśaḥ 1.075.010a gandharvāpsarasaś caiva siddhacāraṇakiṃnarāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2459: 1.075.010c yakṣarākṣasanāgāś ca tad draṣṭuṃ mahad adbhutam
GE09ram_01_u:2460: 1.075.011a jaḍīkṛte tadā loke rāme varadhanurdhare 1.075.011c nirvīryo jāmadagnyo 'sau ramo rāmam udaikṣata
GE09ram_01_u:2462: 1.075.012c rāmaṃ kamala patrākṣaṃ mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:2463: 1.075.013a kāśyapāya mayā dattā yadā pūrvaṃ vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_01_u:2464: 1.075.013c viṣaye me na vastavyam iti māṃ kāśyapo 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:2465: 1.075.014a so 'haṃ guruvacaḥ kurvan pṛthivyāṃ na vase niśām
GE09ram_01_u:2466: 1.075.014c iti pratijñā kākutstha kṛtā vai kāśyapasya ha
GE09ram_01_u:2467: 1.075.015a tad imāṃ tvaṃ gatiṃ vīra hantuṃ nārhasi rāghava 1.075.015c manojavaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahendraṃ parvatottamam
GE09ram_01_u:2468: 1.075.016a lokās tv apratimā rāma nirjitās tapasā mayā
GE09ram_01_u:2469: 1.075.016c jahi tāñ śaramukhyena mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2470: 1.075.017a akṣayyaṃ madhuhantāraṃ jānāmi tvāṃ sureśvaram 1.075.017c dhanuṣo 'sya parāmarśāt svasti te 'stu paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:2471: 1.075.018a ete suragaṇāḥ sarve nirīkṣante samāgatāḥ 1.075.018c tvām apratimakarmāṇam apratidvandvam
GE09ram_01_u:2472: 1.075.019a na ceyaṃ mama kākutstha vrīḍā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_01_u:2473: 1.075.019c tvayā trailokyanāthena yad ahaṃ vimukhīkṛtaḥ 1.075.020a śaram apratimaṃ rāma moktum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:2475: 1.075.021a tathā bruvati rāme tu jāmadagnye pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:2476: 1.075.021c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃś cikṣepa śaram uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:2477: 1.075.022a tato vitimirāḥ sarvā diśā copadiśas tathā
GE09ram_01_u:2478: 1.075.022c surāḥ sarṣigaṇā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsur udāyudham 1.075.023a rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ praśasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:2480: 1.076.001a gate rāme praśāntātmā rāmo dāśarathir dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2482: 1.076.002a abhivādya tato rāmo vasiṣṭha pramukhān ṛṣīn
GE09ram_01_u:2483: 1.076.002c pitaraṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā provāca raghunandanaḥ 1.076.003a jāmadagnyo gato rāmaḥ prayātu caturaṅgiṇī 1.076.003c ayodhyābhimukhī senā tvayā nāthena pālitā 1.076.004a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:2484: 1.076.004c bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya rāghavam 1.076.005a gato rāma iti śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ pramudito nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2485: 1.076.005c codayām āsa tāṃ senāṃ jagāmāśu tataḥ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:2489: 1.076.007c saṃpūrṇāṃ prāviśad rājā janaughaiḥ samalaṃkṛtām 1.076.008a kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca sumadhyamā
GE09ram_01_u:2490: 1.076.008c vadhūpratigrahe yuktā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ 1.076.009a tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgām ūrmilāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_01_u:2493: 1.076.010c devatāyatanāny āśu sarvās tāḥ pratyapūjayan 1.076.011a abhivādyābhivādyāṃś ca sarvā rājasutās tadā 1.076.011c remire muditāḥ sarvā bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā rahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2494: 1.076.012a kṛtadārāḥ kṛtāstrāś ca sadhanāḥ sasuhṛjjanāḥ 1.076.012c śuśrūṣamāṇāḥ pitaraṃ vartayanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2495: 1.076.013a teṣām atiyaśā loke rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 1.076.013c svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ 1.076.014a rāmas tu sītayā sārdhaṃ vijahāra bahūn ṛtūn
GE09ram_01_u:2496: 1.076.014c manasvī tadgatas tasyā nityaṃ hṛdi samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:2497: 1.076.015a priyā tu sītā rāmasya dārāḥ pitṛkṛtā iti
GE09ram_01_u:2498: 1.076.015c guṇād rūpaguṇāc cāpi prītir bhūyo vyavardhata
GE09ram_01_u:2499: 1.076.016a tasyāś ca bhartā dviguṇaṃ hṛdaye parivartate
GE09ram_01_u:2500: 1.076.016c antarjātam api vyaktam ākhyāti hṛdayaṃ hṛdā
GE09ram_01_u:2501: 1.076.017a tasya bhūyo viśeṣeṇa maithilī janakātmajā 1.076.017c devatābhiḥ samā rūpe sītā śrīr iva rūpiṇī
GE09ram_01_u:2502: 1.076.018a tayā sa rājarṣisuto 'bhirāmayā; sameyivān uttamarājakanyayā 1.076.018c atīva rāmaḥ śuśubhe 'tikāmayā; vibhuḥ śriyā viṣṇur
